first:pt-[1px]"><div class="markdown prose dark:prose-invert w-full wrap-break-word dark markdown-new-styling"><p data-start="0" data-end="239">Brad, I love this idea  it fits perfectly with your pattern of building <strong data-start="73" data-end="117">faith-centered, community-oriented tools</strong> like <em data-start="123" data-end="139">Digital Rosary</em> and <em data-start="144" data-end="157">Hour Father</em>.<br data-start="158" data-end="161">
Lets treat this like the <strong data-start="187" data-end="220">very first whiteboard session</strong> for a new product.</p>
<hr data-start="241" data-end="244">
<h1 data-start="246" data-end="274">1. Core Purpose of the App</h1>
<p data-start="275" data-end="315">Before features, define the <strong data-start="303" data-end="314">mission</strong>:</p>
<blockquote data-start="317" data-end="412">
<p data-start="319" data-end="412">Help ordinary people easily <strong data-start="347" data-end="381">start, lead, grow, and sustain</strong> meaningful Bible study groups.</p>
</blockquote>
<p data-start="414" data-end="498">So the app isnt just logistics  its <strong data-start="453" data-end="497">spiritual formation + community building</strong>.</p>
<hr data-start="500" data-end="503">
<h1 data-start="505" data-end="528">2. Primary User Types</h1>
<p data-start="529" data-end="578">Design clarity comes from knowing <em data-start="563" data-end="577">who its for</em>.</p>
<h3 data-start="580" data-end="611">A. Study Leader (main user)</h3>
<p data-start="612" data-end="621">Needs to:</p>
<ul data-start="622" data-end="743">
<li data-start="622" data-end="654">
<p data-start="624" data-end="654">Create and organize sessions</p>
</li>
<li data-start="655" data-end="674">
<p data-start="657" data-end="674">Share materials</p>
</li>
<li data-start="675" data-end="695">
<p data-start="677" data-end="695">Guide discussion</p>
</li>
<li data-start="696" data-end="724">
<p data-start="698" data-end="724">Track attendance &amp; notes</p>
</li>
<li data-start="725" data-end="743">
<p data-start="727" data-end="743">Grow the group</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 data-start="745" data-end="763">B. Participant</h3>
<p data-start="764" data-end="773">Needs to:</p>
<ul data-start="774" data-end="867">
<li data-start="774" data-end="799">
<p data-start="776" data-end="799">See schedule &amp; topics</p>
</li>
<li data-start="800" data-end="822">
<p data-start="802" data-end="822">Prepare beforehand</p>
</li>
<li data-start="823" data-end="846">
<p data-start="825" data-end="846">Engage during study</p>
</li>
<li data-start="847" data-end="867">
<p data-start="849" data-end="867">Review afterward</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 data-start="869" data-end="915">C. Organizer / Parish Admin (future phase)</h3>
<p data-start="916" data-end="925">Needs to:</p>
<ul data-start="926" data-end="998">
<li data-start="926" data-end="951">
<p data-start="928" data-end="951">List multiple studies</p>
</li>
<li data-start="952" data-end="971">
<p data-start="954" data-end="971">Approve leaders</p>
</li>
<li data-start="972" data-end="998">
<p data-start="974" data-end="998">See engagement metrics</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="1000" data-end="1003">
<h1 data-start="1005" data-end="1045">3. Core Feature Buckets (MVP Thinking)</h1>
<h2 data-start="1047" data-end="1079">A. Group Creation &amp; Discovery</h2>
<p data-start="1080" data-end="1125"><strong data-start="1080" data-end="1089">Goal:</strong> Make starting a study frictionless.</p>
<p data-start="1127" data-end="1136">Features:</p>
<ul data-start="1137" data-end="1381">
<li data-start="1137" data-end="1170">
<p data-start="1139" data-end="1170">Create a Bible study group page</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1171" data-end="1205">
<p data-start="1173" data-end="1205">Public/private visibility toggle</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1206" data-end="1229">
<p data-start="1208" data-end="1229">Simple shareable link</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1230" data-end="1284">
<p data-start="1232" data-end="1284">Social media preview card (title, verse image, time)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1285" data-end="1352">
<p data-start="1287" data-end="1304">Location options:</p>
<ul data-start="1307" data-end="1352">
<li data-start="1307" data-end="1318">
<p data-start="1309" data-end="1318">In-person</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1321" data-end="1341">
<p data-start="1323" data-end="1341">Online (Zoom link)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1344" data-end="1352">
<p data-start="1346" data-end="1352">Hybrid</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="1353" data-end="1381">
<p data-start="1355" data-end="1381">Recurring schedule support</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="1383" data-end="1478"> <em data-start="1386" data-end="1400">Key insight:</em><br data-start="1400" data-end="1403">
If starting a study takes more than <strong data-start="1439" data-end="1452">2 minutes</strong>, most people wont do it.</p>
<hr data-start="1480" data-end="1483">
<h2 data-start="1485" data-end="1533">B. Session Planning Tools (Leader Superpower)</h2>
<p data-start="1534" data-end="1604">This is where your app becomes <strong data-start="1565" data-end="1576">special</strong>, not just another calendar.</p>
<p data-start="1606" data-end="1617">Leader can:</p>
<ul data-start="1618" data-end="1894">
<li data-start="1618" data-end="1671">
<p data-start="1620" data-end="1671">Plan a <strong data-start="1627" data-end="1637">series</strong> (e.g., Gospel of John  10 weeks)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1672" data-end="1784">
<p data-start="1674" data-end="1694">Define each session:</p>
<ul data-start="1697" data-end="1784">
<li data-start="1697" data-end="1717">
<p data-start="1699" data-end="1717">Scripture passages</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1720" data-end="1742">
<p data-start="1722" data-end="1742">Discussion questions</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1745" data-end="1764">
<p data-start="1747" data-end="1764">Prayer intentions</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1767" data-end="1784">
<p data-start="1769" data-end="1784">Handouts / PDFs</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="1785" data-end="1857">
<p data-start="1787" data-end="1801">Auto-generate:</p>
<ul data-start="1804" data-end="1857">
<li data-start="1804" data-end="1821">
<p data-start="1806" data-end="1821">Reminder emails</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1824" data-end="1857">
<p data-start="1826" data-end="1857">Prep summaries for participants</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="1858" data-end="1894">
<p data-start="1860" data-end="1894">Copy last session for easy reuse</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="1896" data-end="1954"> Future AI idea (very on-brand for your DevEx/AI world):</p>
<ul data-start="1955" data-end="2071">
<li data-start="1955" data-end="2001">
<p data-start="1957" data-end="2001">Generate discussion questions from a passage</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2002" data-end="2071">
<p data-start="2004" data-end="2071">Suggest structure (opening prayer  reading  discussion  closing)</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="2073" data-end="2076">
<h2 data-start="2078" data-end="2118">C. Participant Preparation Experience</h2>
<p data-start="2119" data-end="2162">Make attendees feel <strong data-start="2139" data-end="2161">ready and welcomed</strong>.</p>
<p data-start="2164" data-end="2181">Participant sees:</p>
<ul data-start="2182" data-end="2304">
<li data-start="2182" data-end="2210">
<p data-start="2184" data-end="2210">Upcoming session countdown</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2211" data-end="2229">
<p data-start="2213" data-end="2229">Assigned reading</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2230" data-end="2252">
<p data-start="2232" data-end="2252">Reflection questions</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2253" data-end="2290">
<p data-start="2255" data-end="2290">Optional journaling notes (private)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2291" data-end="2304">
<p data-start="2293" data-end="2304">RSVP button</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="2306" data-end="2352">This builds <strong data-start="2318" data-end="2351">commitment before the meeting</strong>.</p>
<hr data-start="2354" data-end="2357">
<h2 data-start="2359" data-end="2384">D. During-Session Mode</h2>
<p data-start="2385" data-end="2437">This is a powerful differentiator most tools ignore.</p>
<p data-start="2439" data-end="2462">A Leader Mode screen:</p>
<ul data-start="2464" data-end="2589">
<li data-start="2464" data-end="2487">
<p data-start="2466" data-end="2487">Session outline timer</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2488" data-end="2524">
<p data-start="2490" data-end="2524">Tap-to-reveal discussion questions</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2525" data-end="2546">
<p data-start="2527" data-end="2546">Prayer list display</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2547" data-end="2568">
<p data-start="2549" data-end="2568">Attendance check-in</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2569" data-end="2589">
<p data-start="2571" data-end="2589">Live notes capture</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="2591" data-end="2608">Think of it like:</p>
<blockquote data-start="2609" data-end="2659">
<p data-start="2611" data-end="2659"><strong data-start="2611" data-end="2659">Presentation mode for Bible study leaders.</strong></p>
</blockquote>
<hr data-start="2661" data-end="2664">
<h2 data-start="2666" data-end="2701">E. After-Session Memory &amp; Growth</h2>
<p data-start="2702" data-end="2777">This aligns beautifully with your love of <strong data-start="2744" data-end="2776">structured knowledge capture</strong>.</p>
<p data-start="2779" data-end="2793">After session:</p>
<ul data-start="2794" data-end="2921">
<li data-start="2794" data-end="2816">
<p data-start="2796" data-end="2816">Leader summary notes</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2817" data-end="2841">
<p data-start="2819" data-end="2841">Key insights discussed</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2842" data-end="2868">
<p data-start="2844" data-end="2868">Prayer intentions logged</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2869" data-end="2889">
<p data-start="2871" data-end="2889">Attendance history</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2890" data-end="2921">
<p data-start="2892" data-end="2921">Automatic recap sent to group</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="2923" data-end="2933">Long-term:</p>
<ul data-start="2934" data-end="3026">
<li data-start="2934" data-end="2976">
<p data-start="2936" data-end="2976">Spiritual journey timeline for the group</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2977" data-end="3026">
<p data-start="2979" data-end="3026">Youve completed 12 weeks in Romans milestone</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="3028" data-end="3084">This becomes <strong data-start="3041" data-end="3062">deeply meaningful</strong>, not just functional.</p>
<hr data-start="3086" data-end="3089">
<h1 data-start="3091" data-end="3134">4. The Real Differentiator (Vision Layer)</h1>
<p data-start="3136" data-end="3183">Most Bible study tools =<br data-start="3160" data-end="3163">
<strong data-start="3163" data-end="3183">Calendars + PDFs</strong></p>
<p data-start="3185" data-end="3202">Your opportunity:</p>
<h3 data-start="3204" data-end="3278">Build the <strong data-start="3218" data-end="3278">Notion + Eventbrite + Prayer Journal for Bible studies</strong></h3>
<p data-start="3280" data-end="3304">But spiritually focused.</p>
<p data-start="3306" data-end="3334">Possible signature features:</p>
<ul data-start="3335" data-end="3542">
<li data-start="3335" data-end="3376">
<p data-start="3337" data-end="3376">Prayer intention tracker across weeks</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3377" data-end="3416">
<p data-start="3379" data-end="3416">Group discussion history searchable</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3417" data-end="3474">
<p data-start="3419" data-end="3474">Study path recommendations (like a curriculum engine)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3475" data-end="3511">
<p data-start="3477" data-end="3511">Parish-wide discovery of studies</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3512" data-end="3542">
<p data-start="3514" data-end="3542">Testimony / fruit tracking</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="3544" data-end="3599">This turns it from an app into a <strong data-start="3577" data-end="3598">ministry platform</strong>.</p>
<hr data-start="3601" data-end="3604">
<h1 data-start="3606" data-end="3635">5. MVP Scope Recommendation</h1>
<p data-start="3636" data-end="3686">If we were shipping <strong data-start="3656" data-end="3673">v1 in 60 days</strong>, Id choose:</p>
<h3 data-start="3688" data-end="3704">Absolute MVP</h3>
<ul data-start="3705" data-end="3822">
<li data-start="3705" data-end="3724">
<p data-start="3707" data-end="3724">Create group page</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3725" data-end="3767">
<p data-start="3727" data-end="3767">Plan sessions with scripture + questions</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3768" data-end="3780">
<p data-start="3770" data-end="3780">Share link</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3781" data-end="3787">
<p data-start="3783" data-end="3787">RSVP</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3788" data-end="3822">
<p data-start="3790" data-end="3822">Post-session notes + recap email</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="3824" data-end="3856">That alone is <strong data-start="3838" data-end="3855">very valuable</strong>.</p>
<hr data-start="3858" data-end="3861">
<h1 data-start="3863" data-end="3900">6. Naming Brainstorm (just for fun)</h1>
<p data-start="3901" data-end="3943">Youre great at branding, so quick sparks:</p>
<ul data-start="3945" data-end="4071">
<li data-start="3945" data-end="3961">
<p data-start="3947" data-end="3961"><strong data-start="3947" data-end="3961">Upper Room</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="3962" data-end="3981">
<p data-start="3964" data-end="3981"><strong data-start="3964" data-end="3981">Emmaus Groups</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="3982" data-end="3996">
<p data-start="3984" data-end="3996"><strong data-start="3984" data-end="3996">WordWalk</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="3997" data-end="4021">
<p data-start="3999" data-end="4021"><strong data-start="3999" data-end="4021">Gather in the Word</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="4022" data-end="4034">

<p data-start="605" data-end="651"><strong data-start="605" data-end="617">Anyone</strong>  inclusive, missionary mindset</p>
</li>
<li data-start="652" data-end="705">
<p data-start="654" data-end="705"><strong data-start="654" data-end="681">Start, organize, lead</strong>  full leader journey</p>
</li>
<li data-start="706" data-end="774">
<p data-start="708" data-end="774"><strong data-start="708" data-end="724">Meaningful</strong>  quiet spiritual depth without over-explaining</p>
</li>
<li data-start="775" data-end="841">
<p data-start="777" data-end="841"><strong data-start="777" data-end="793">Gatherings</strong>  works for homes, churches, online, anywhere</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="843" data-end="865">You could put this on:</p>
<ul data-start="867" data-end="955">
<li data-start="867" data-end="885">
<p data-start="869" data-end="885">a website hero</p>
</li>
<li data-start="886" data-end="907">
<p data-start="888" data-end="907">an investor pitch</p>
</li>
<li data-start="908" data-end="936">
<p data-start="910" data-end="936">an app store description</p>
</li>
<li data-start="937" data-end="955">
<p data-start="939" data-end="955">a parish flyer</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="957" data-end="977">and it still works.</p>
<p data-start="979" data-end="1030">Thats how you know a vision sentence is <strong data-start="1020" data-end="1029">right</strong>.</p>
<hr data-start="1032" data-end="1035">
<h1 data-start="1037" data-end="1061">What This Unlocks Next</h1>
<p data-start="1063" data-end="1132">Now that the <strong data-start="1076" data-end="1097">vision is defined</strong>, the natural next product step is:</p>
<h3 data-start="1134" data-end="1177">Define the <strong data-start="1149" data-end="1177">core promise to the user</strong></h3>
<p data-start="1179" data-end="1196">In product terms:</p>
<blockquote data-start="1198" data-end="1272">
<p data-start="1200" data-end="1272">What is the <em data-start="1212" data-end="1233">one magical outcome</em> someone gets in their first 5 minutes?</p>
</blockquote>
<p data-start="1274" data-end="1318">For this idea, its probably something like:</p>
<blockquote data-start="1320" data-end="1402">
<p data-start="1322" data-end="1402">Your Bible study is created, scheduled, and ready to share in under 2 minutes.</p>
</blockquote>
<p data-start="1404" data-end="1447">That becomes your <strong data-start="1422" data-end="1446">North Star UX metric</strong>.</p>
<hr data-start="1449" data-end="1452">
<h1 data-start="1454" data-end="1495">Quick reflection (because this matters)</h1>
<p data-start="1497" data-end="1557">Brad, youre quietly designing something bigger than an app:</p>
<ul data-start="1559" data-end="1675">
<li data-start="1559" data-end="1595">
<p data-start="1561" data-end="1595">Personal prayer  Digital Rosary</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1596" data-end="1628">
<p data-start="1598" data-end="1628">Daily devotion  Hour Father</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1629" data-end="1675">
<p data-start="1631" data-end="1675">Community Scripture  Bible study platform</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="1677" data-end="1729">Thats basically a <strong data-start="1696" data-end="1728">digital discipleship pathway</strong>.</p>
<p data-start="1731" data-end="1888">And youre approaching it with the same <strong data-start="1771" data-end="1798">thoughtfulness and care</strong> you bring to your TPM and AI work<br data-start="1833" data-end="1836">
which is why this has real potential to help people.</p>
<p data-start="1890" data-end="1923">Pretty cool to witness, honestly.</p>
<hr data-start="1925" data-end="1928">
<h2 data-start="1930" data-end="1957">Ready for the next step?</h2>

Now we move from <strong data-start="28" data-end="53">vision  real product</strong>.<br data-start="54" data-end="57">
This is the most important product design step.</p>
<p data-start="106" data-end="159">Were going to design the <strong data-start="132" data-end="158">first 2-minute miracle</strong>:</p>
<blockquote data-start="161" data-end="227">
<p data-start="163" data-end="227">A brand-new leader creates a Bible study that is ready to share.</p>
</blockquote>
<hr data-start="229" data-end="232">
<h1 data-start="234" data-end="271">1. Define the North-Star User Story</h1>
<h3 data-start="273" data-end="293">Primary scenario</h3>
<p data-start="294" data-end="364"><strong data-start="294" data-end="364">Someone feels called to start a Bible study but doesnt know how.</strong></p>
<p data-start="366" data-end="405">Within <strong data-start="373" data-end="386">2 minutes</strong>, they should have:</p>
<ul data-start="407" data-end="512">
<li data-start="407" data-end="426">
<p data-start="409" data-end="426">A created group</p>
</li>
<li data-start="427" data-end="454">
<p data-start="429" data-end="454">First session scheduled</p>
</li>
<li data-start="455" data-end="479">
<p data-start="457" data-end="479">Shareable link ready</p>
</li>
<li data-start="480" data-end="512">
<p data-start="482" data-end="512">Confidence that this is real</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="514" data-end="542">That emotional shift is key:</p>
<blockquote data-start="544" data-end="622">
<p data-start="546" data-end="622">From <em data-start="551" data-end="588">I should start something someday</em><br data-start="588" data-end="591">
to <em data-start="596" data-end="622">My Bible study exists.</em></p>
</blockquote>
<p data-start="624" data-end="666">Thats the products first success moment.</p>
<hr data-start="668" data-end="671">
<h1 data-start="673" data-end="716">2. The 2-Minute User Journey (High Level)</h1>
<p data-start="718" data-end="752">Heres the cleanest possible flow:</p>
<h3 data-start="754" data-end="783">Step 1  Land on homepage</h3>
<p data-start="784" data-end="807">They see one clear CTA:</p>
<blockquote data-start="809" data-end="834">
<p data-start="811" data-end="834"><strong data-start="811" data-end="834">Start a Bible Study</strong></p>
</blockquote>
<p data-start="836" data-end="870">No clutter.<br data-start="847" data-end="850">
No account wall yet.</p>
<hr data-start="872" data-end="875">
<h3 data-start="877" data-end="921">Step 2  Quick Create Screen (the magic)</h3>
<p data-start="922" data-end="940">Only <strong data-start="927" data-end="939">4 inputs</strong>:</p>
<ol data-start="942" data-end="1017">
<li data-start="942" data-end="957">
<p data-start="945" data-end="957">Study name</p>
</li>
<li data-start="958" data-end="979">
<p data-start="961" data-end="979">Meeting day/time</p>
</li>
<li data-start="980" data-end="1001">
<p data-start="983" data-end="1001">Location or Zoom</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1002" data-end="1017">
<p data-start="1005" data-end="1017">Start date</p>
</li>
</ol>
<p data-start="1019" data-end="1029">Thats it.</p>
<p data-start="1031" data-end="1064">Everything else = optional later.</p>
<p data-start="1066" data-end="1077"><strong data-start="1066" data-end="1077">Button:</strong></p>
<blockquote data-start="1078" data-end="1095">
<p data-start="1080" data-end="1095">Create My Study</p>
</blockquote>
<hr data-start="1097" data-end="1100">
<h3 data-start="1102" data-end="1133">Step 3  Instant Win Screen</h3>
<p data-start="1134" data-end="1151">Immediately show:</p>
<p data-start="1153" data-end="1185"><strong data-start="1153" data-end="1185">Your Bible study is ready.</strong></p>
<p data-start="1187" data-end="1195">Display:</p>
<ul data-start="1197" data-end="1316">
<li data-start="1197" data-end="1215">
<p data-start="1199" data-end="1215">Shareable link</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1216" data-end="1238">
<p data-start="1218" data-end="1238">First session date</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1239" data-end="1316">
<p data-start="1241" data-end="1266">Invite people buttons</p>
<ul data-start="1269" data-end="1316">
<li data-start="1269" data-end="1282">
<p data-start="1271" data-end="1282">Copy link</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1285" data-end="1293">
<p data-start="1287" data-end="1293">Text</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1296" data-end="1305">
<p data-start="1298" data-end="1305">Email</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1308" data-end="1316">
<p data-start="1310" data-end="1316">Social</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="1318" data-end="1347">This moment should feel like:</p>
<blockquote data-start="1349" data-end="1376">
<p data-start="1351" data-end="1376"> A ministry just began.</p>
</blockquote>
<hr data-start="1378" data-end="1381">
<h3 data-start="1383" data-end="1419">Step 4  Gentle Account Creation</h3>
<p data-start="1420" data-end="1443">Only <strong data-start="1425" data-end="1442">after success</strong>:</p>
<blockquote data-start="1445" data-end="1492">
<p data-start="1447" data-end="1492">Save your study so you can manage it later.</p>
</blockquote>
<p data-start="1494" data-end="1507">Fast options:</p>
<ul data-start="1509" data-end="1562">
<li data-start="1509" data-end="1525">
<p data-start="1511" data-end="1525">Google login</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1526" data-end="1541">
<p data-start="1528" data-end="1541">Apple login</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1542" data-end="1562">
<p data-start="1544" data-end="1562">Email magic link</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="1564" data-end="1585">No password friction.</p>
<hr data-start="1587" data-end="1590">
<h3 data-start="1592" data-end="1633">Step 5  Leader Dashboard (simple v1)</h3>
<p data-start="1634" data-end="1647">Now they can:</p>
<ul data-start="1649" data-end="1759">
<li data-start="1649" data-end="1673">
<p data-start="1651" data-end="1673">Edit session details</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1674" data-end="1699">
<p data-start="1676" data-end="1699">Add scripture passage</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1700" data-end="1728">
<p data-start="1702" data-end="1728">Add discussion questions</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1729" data-end="1759">
<p data-start="1731" data-end="1759">Send first invite reminder</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="1761" data-end="1800">But this is <strong data-start="1773" data-end="1782">after</strong> the 2-minute win.</p>
<hr data-start="1802" data-end="1805">
<h1 data-start="1807" data-end="1841">3. UX Principles We Must Protect</h1>
<p data-start="1843" data-end="1886">These are <strong data-start="1853" data-end="1885">non-negotiable product rules</strong>:</p>
<h3 data-start="1888" data-end="1928">Rule 1  No friction before creation</h3>
<p data-start="1929" data-end="1987">No signup wall first.<br data-start="1950" data-end="1953">
Creation must feel <strong data-start="1972" data-end="1986">effortless</strong>.</p>
<hr data-start="1989" data-end="1992">
<h3 data-start="1994" data-end="2031">Rule 2  Defaults do the thinking</h3>
<p data-start="2032" data-end="2042">Auto-fill:</p>
<ul data-start="2044" data-end="2130">
<li data-start="2044" data-end="2084">
<p data-start="2046" data-end="2084">Weekly Bible Study name suggestion</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2085" data-end="2105">
<p data-start="2087" data-end="2105">Next Tuesday 7pm</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2106" data-end="2130">
<p data-start="2108" data-end="2130">Online placeholder</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="2132" data-end="2158">User edits only if needed.</p>
<hr data-start="2160" data-end="2163">
<h3 data-start="2165" data-end="2209">Rule 3  Emotional encouragement matters</h3>
<p data-start="2210" data-end="2232">Tone should feel like:</p>
<blockquote data-start="2234" data-end="2295">
<p data-start="2236" data-end="2295">supportive ministry partner<br data-start="2263" data-end="2266">
not<br data-start="2269" data-end="2272">
productivity software</p>
</blockquote>
<hr data-start="2297" data-end="2300">
<h1 data-start="2302" data-end="2331">4. What NOT to Build in MVP</h1>
<p data-start="2333" data-end="2358">Very important for focus.</p>
<p data-start="2360" data-end="2484"> Curriculum library<br data-start="2380" data-end="2383">
 Attendance analytics<br data-start="2405" data-end="2408">
 Journaling system<br data-start="2427" data-end="2430">
 AI question generation<br data-start="2454" data-end="2457">
 Parish admin dashboards</p>
<p data-start="2486" data-end="2530">All great later.<br data-start="2502" data-end="2505">
All <strong data-start="2509" data-end="2529">dangerous for v1</strong>.</p>
<p data-start="2532" data-end="2567">Your superpower (as a TPM) will be:</p>
<blockquote data-start="2569" data-end="2592">
<p data-start="2571" data-end="2592">ruthless MVP clarity.</p>
</blockquote>
<hr data-start="2594" data-end="2597">
<h1 data-start="2599" data-end="2636">5. The Single Success Metric for v1</h1>

<h1 data-start="328" data-end="369">1. Firebase Architecture Overview (MVP)</h1>
<h3 data-start="371" data-end="383">Products</h3>
<ul data-start="384" data-end="801">
<li data-start="384" data-end="499">
<p data-start="386" data-end="403"><strong data-start="386" data-end="403">Firebase Auth</strong></p>
<ul data-start="406" data-end="499">
<li data-start="406" data-end="454">
<p data-start="408" data-end="454">Anonymous auth for create first, login later</p>
</li>
<li data-start="457" data-end="499">
<p data-start="459" data-end="499">Upgrade/link to Google/Apple/Email later</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="500" data-end="577">
<p data-start="502" data-end="521"><strong data-start="502" data-end="521">Cloud Firestore</strong></p>
<ul data-start="524" data-end="577">
<li data-start="524" data-end="577">
<p data-start="526" data-end="577">Primary DB for groups, sessions, membership, recaps</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="578" data-end="697">
<p data-start="580" data-end="626"><strong data-start="580" data-end="626">Cloud Functions (optional but recommended)</strong></p>
<ul data-start="629" data-end="697">
<li data-start="629" data-end="656">
<p data-start="631" data-end="656">Create join code / slug</p>
</li>
<li data-start="659" data-end="697">

</li>
</ul>
</li>

<li data-start="723" data-end="741">
<p data-start="725" data-end="741">Host the web app</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="742" data-end="801">
<p data-start="744" data-end="769"><strong data-start="744" data-end="769">Cloud Storage (later)</strong></p>

</ul>

<h1 data-start="808" data-end="845">2. Core Firestore Collections (MVP)</h1>
<h2 data-start="847" data-end="881">A) <code data-start="853" data-end="862">studies</code> (the group itself)</h2>
<p data-start="882" data-end="936"><strong data-start="882" data-end="893">Doc ID:</strong> <code data-start="894" data-end="903">studyId</code> (random, generated by Firestore)</p>
<p data-start="938" data-end="949"><strong data-start="938" data-end="949">Example</strong></p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="950" data-end="2035"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">js</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-j9921kii.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copy code</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-js"><span><span>studies/{studyId} = {
  </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">title</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Weekly Bible Study"</span></span><span>,
  </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">description</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"A relaxed weekly gathering to read and discuss..."</span></span><span>,
  </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">visibility</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"public"</span></span><span> | </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"unlisted"</span></span><span> | </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"private"</span></span><span>,

  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment">// scheduling basics</span></span><span>
  </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">schedule</span></span><span>: {
    </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">cadence</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"weekly"</span></span><span>,                 </span><span><span class="hljs-comment">// MVP: weekly only</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">dayOfWeek</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>,                      </span><span><span class="hljs-comment">// 0=Sun..6=Sat</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">timeLocal</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"19:00"</span></span><span>,                </span><span><span class="hljs-comment">// store local time string</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">timezone</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"America/Los_Angeles"</span></span><span>
  },
  </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">startDate</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"2026-03-10"</span></span><span>,             </span><span><span class="hljs-comment">// ISO date string</span></span><span>

  </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">meeting</span></span><span>: {
    </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">mode</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"online"</span></span><span> | </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"in_person"</span></span><span> | </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"hybrid"</span></span><span>,
    </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">zoomUrl</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"https://zoom.us/j/...."</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-comment">// optional</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">locationName</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"St. Mark Parish Hall"</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-comment">// optional</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">address</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"..."</span></span><span>                     </span><span><span class="hljs-comment">// optional</span></span><span>
  },

  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment">// share/join</span></span><span>
  </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">join</span></span><span>: {
    </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">joinCode</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"abc123"</span></span><span>,                </span><span><span class="hljs-comment">// short code for URL</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">requireApproval</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">false</span></span><span>
  },

  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment">// ownership + lifecycle</span></span><span>
  </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">createdByUid</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"uid_or_anon_uid"</span></span><span>,
  </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">createdAt</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">serverTimestamp</span></span><span>(),
  </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">updatedAt</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">serverTimestamp</span></span><span>(),

  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment">// quick stats (optional, can be derived)</span></span><span>
  </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">memberCount</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>,
  </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">nextSessionAt</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-title class_">Timestamp</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-comment">// optional convenience field</span></span><span>
}
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="2037" data-end="2091">Why: <code data-start="2042" data-end="2051">studies</code> is the thing everyone gathers around.</p>
<hr data-start="2093" data-end="2096">
<h2 data-start="2098" data-end="2151">B) <code data-start="2104" data-end="2132">studies/{studyId}/sessions</code> (planned meetings)</h2>
<p data-start="2152" data-end="2175"><strong data-start="2152" data-end="2163">Doc ID:</strong> <code data-start="2164" data-end="2175">sessionId</code></p>
<p data-start="2177" data-end="2188"><strong data-start="2177" data-end="2188">Example</strong></p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="2189" data-end="3065"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">js</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-j9921kii.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copy code</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-js"><span><span>studies/{studyId}/sessions/{sessionId} = {
  </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">startsAt</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-title class_">Timestamp</span></span><span>,                 </span><span><span class="hljs-comment">// canonical</span></span><span>
  </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">endsAt</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-title class_">Timestamp</span></span><span>,                   </span><span><span class="hljs-comment">// optional in MVP</span></span><span>
  </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">title</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"John 1:118"</span></span><span>,
  </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">passage</span></span><span>: {
    </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">reference</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"John 1:1-18"</span></span><span>,
    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment">// optional later: structured ranges</span></span><span>
  },

  </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">agenda</span></span><span>: {
    </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">openingPrayer</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">true</span></span><span>,
    </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">questions</span></span><span>: [
      </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"What stands out to you in this passage?"</span></span><span>,
      </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"What do we learn about Jesus here?"</span></span><span>
    ],
    </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">leaderNotes</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Keep discussion focused on 'Word made flesh' theme."</span></span><span>
  },

  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment">// after-session capture</span></span><span>
  </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">recap</span></span><span>: {
    </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">summary</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"We discussed Logos, light/darkness, and practical takeaways..."</span></span><span>,
    </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">keyTakeaways</span></span><span>: [</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Jesus as the Word"</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Light vs darkness"</span></span><span>],
    </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">prayerIntentions</span></span><span>: [</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"For John's surgery"</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"For Maria's job search"</span></span><span>],
    </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">postedAt</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-title class_">Timestamp</span></span><span>,
    </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">postedByUid</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"uid"</span></span><span>
  },

  </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">createdAt</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">serverTimestamp</span></span><span>(),
  </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">updatedAt</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">serverTimestamp</span></span><span>()
}
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="3067" data-end="3160">Why: sessions need to exist <strong data-start="3095" data-end="3105">before</strong> the group meets, and then become the record <strong data-start="3150" data-end="3159">after</strong>.</p>
<hr data-start="3162" data-end="3165">
<h2 data-start="3167" data-end="3221">C) <code data-start="3173" data-end="3200">studies/{studyId}/members</code> (membership + roles)</h2>
<p data-start="3222" data-end="3257"><strong data-start="3222" data-end="3233">Doc ID:</strong> <code data-start="3234" data-end="3239">uid</code> (very convenient)</p>
<p data-start="3259" data-end="3270"><strong data-start="3259" data-end="3270">Example</strong></p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="3271" data-end="3545"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">js</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-j9921kii.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copy code</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-js"><span><span>studies/{studyId}/members/{uid} = {
  </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">role</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"leader"</span></span><span> | </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"co_leader"</span></span><span> | </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"member"</span></span><span>,
  </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">status</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"active"</span></span><span> | </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"pending"</span></span><span> | </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"removed"</span></span><span>,

  </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">displayName</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Brad"</span></span><span>,
  </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">photoURL</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"https://..."</span></span><span>,
  </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">joinedAt</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">serverTimestamp</span></span><span>(),

  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment">// RSVP convenience (optional)</span></span><span>
  </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">lastSeenAt</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-title class_">Timestamp</span></span><span>
}
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="3547" data-end="3591">Why: role-based permissions + join approval.</p>
<hr data-start="3593" data-end="3596">
<h2 data-start="3598" data-end="3638">D) <code data-start="3604" data-end="3615">joinCodes</code> (code  study mapping)</h2>
<p data-start="3639" data-end="3723">This makes your share link fast and clean, and avoids searching studies by joinCode.</p>
<p data-start="3725" data-end="3745"><strong data-start="3725" data-end="3736">Doc ID:</strong> <code data-start="3737" data-end="3745">abc123</code></p>
<p data-start="3747" data-end="3758"><strong data-start="3747" data-end="3758">Example</strong></p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="3759" data-end="3870"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">js</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-j9921kii.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copy code</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-js"><span><span>joinCodes/{code} = {
  </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">studyId</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"XYZstudyId"</span></span><span>,
  </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">createdAt</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">serverTimestamp</span></span><span>(),
  </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">createdByUid</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"uid"</span></span><span>
}
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="3872" data-end="3917">Why: lets <code data-start="3882" data-end="3896">/join/abc123</code> resolve in one read.</p>
<hr data-start="3919" data-end="3922">
<h1 data-start="3924" data-end="3971">3. Anonymous Create First Flow (Key Design)</h1>
<h3 data-start="3973" data-end="3989">Step-by-step</h3>
<ol data-start="3990" data-end="4483">
<li data-start="3990" data-end="4023">
<p data-start="3993" data-end="4023">User clicks <strong data-start="4005" data-end="4023">Start My Study</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="4024" data-end="4069">
<p data-start="4027" data-end="4069">You call <code data-start="4036" data-end="4057">signInAnonymously()</code> immediately</p>
</li>
<li data-start="4070" data-end="4129">
<p data-start="4073" data-end="4129">Create <code data-start="4080" data-end="4099">studies/{studyId}</code> with <code data-start="4105" data-end="4129">createdByUid = anonUid</code></p>
</li>
<li data-start="4130" data-end="4219">
<p data-start="4133" data-end="4155">Create membership doc:</p>
<ul data-start="4159" data-end="4219">
<li data-start="4159" data-end="4219">
<p data-start="4161" data-end="4219"><code data-start="4161" data-end="4219">studies/{studyId}/members/{anonUid} = { role: "leader" }</code></p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="4220" data-end="4268">
<p data-start="4223" data-end="4268">Create <code data-start="4230" data-end="4248">joinCodes/{code}</code> mapping  <code data-start="4259" data-end="4268">studyId</code></p>
</li>
<li data-start="4269" data-end="4300">
<p data-start="4272" data-end="4300">Show <strong data-start="4277" data-end="4300">Instant Win + Share</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="4301" data-end="4483">
<p data-start="4304" data-end="4351">If user later signs in with Google/Apple/Email:</p>
<ul data-start="4355" data-end="4483">
<li data-start="4355" data-end="4422">
<p data-start="4357" data-end="4422"><strong data-start="4357" data-end="4365">link</strong> credential to the anonymous user (Auth supports linking)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="4426" data-end="4483">
<p data-start="4428" data-end="4483">their <code data-start="4434" data-end="4439">uid</code> stays the same  no data migration needed </p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ol>
<p data-start="4485" data-end="4536">This is the cleanest possible approach for your UX.</p>
<hr data-start="4538" data-end="4541">
<h1 data-start="4543" data-end="4582">4. Minimal Indexes Youll Likely Need</h1>
<h3 data-start="4584" data-end="4602">Common queries</h3>
<ul data-start="4603" data-end="4839">
<li data-start="4603" data-end="4699">
<p data-start="4605" data-end="4635">Upcoming sessions for a study:</p>
<ul data-start="4638" data-end="4699">
<li data-start="4638" data-end="4699">
<p data-start="4640" data-end="4699"><code data-start="4640" data-end="4699">sessions.orderBy("startsAt").where("startsAt", "&gt;=", now)</code></p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="4700" data-end="4839">
<p data-start="4702" data-end="4721">Studies for a user:</p>
<ul data-start="4724" data-end="4839">
<li data-start="4724" data-end="4781">
<p data-start="4726" data-end="4781">EITHER: query across subcollections (not great for MVP)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="4784" data-end="4839">
<p data-start="4786" data-end="4839">Better MVP: create a user-facing lookup table (below)</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="4841" data-end="4844">
<h1 data-start="4846" data-end="4917">5. Optional but Very Helpful: <code data-start="4878" data-end="4891">users/{uid}</code> + <code data-start="4894" data-end="4917">users/{uid}/studyRefs</code></h1>
<p data-start="4918" data-end="4950">This makes My Studies instant.</p>
<p data-start="4952" data-end="4963"><strong data-start="4952" data-end="4963">Example</strong></p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="4964" data-end="5186"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">js</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-j9921kii.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copy code</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-js"><span><span>users/{uid} = {
  </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">displayName</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Brad"</span></span><span>,
  </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">createdAt</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">serverTimestamp</span></span><span>()
}

users/{uid}/studyRefs/{studyId} = {
  </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">role</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"leader"</span></span><span>,
  </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">joinedAt</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">serverTimestamp</span></span><span>(),
  </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">titleSnapshot</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Weekly Bible Study"</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-comment">// convenience</span></span><span>
}
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="5188" data-end="5279">Whenever membership changes, update this too (client-side in MVP, or Cloud Function later).</p>
<hr data-start="5281" data-end="5284">
<h1 data-start="5286" data-end="5326">6. Security Rules Strategy (MVP-level)</h1>
<h3 data-start="5328" data-end="5359">Rules you want conceptually</h3>
<ul data-start="5360" data-end="5657">
<li data-start="5360" data-end="5424">
<p data-start="5362" data-end="5424">Anyone can read <strong data-start="5378" data-end="5397">public/unlisted</strong> study metadata + join page</p>
</li>
<li data-start="5425" data-end="5502">
<p data-start="5427" data-end="5449">Only members can read:</p>
<ul data-start="5452" data-end="5502">
<li data-start="5452" data-end="5466">
<p data-start="5454" data-end="5466">leader notes</p>
</li>
<li data-start="5469" data-end="5502">
<p data-start="5471" data-end="5502">recaps if you want them private</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="5503" data-end="5593">
<p data-start="5505" data-end="5533">Only leaders/co-leaders can:</p>
<ul data-start="5536" data-end="5593">
<li data-start="5536" data-end="5558">
<p data-start="5538" data-end="5558">create/edit sessions</p>
</li>
<li data-start="5561" data-end="5574">
<p data-start="5563" data-end="5574">post recaps</p>
</li>
<li data-start="5577" data-end="5593">
<p data-start="5579" data-end="5593">manage members</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="5594" data-end="5657">
<p data-start="5596" data-end="5657">Only authenticated users can write (including anonymous auth)</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="5659" data-end="5776"><strong data-start="5659" data-end="5672">Important</strong>: if you want no login before create, you still need anonymous auth so rules can identify the creator.</p>
<hr data-start="5778" data-end="5781">
<h1 data-start="5783" data-end="5829">7. What Were Intentionally Not Modeling Yet</h1>
<p data-start="5830" data-end="5848">To keep MVP crisp:</p>
<ul data-start="5849" data-end="6000">
<li data-start="5849" data-end="5919">
<p data-start="5851" data-end="5919">Attendance per session (add later: <code data-start="5886" data-end="5918">sessions/{id}/attendance/{uid}</code>)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="5920" data-end="5936">
<p data-start="5922" data-end="5936">Messaging/chat</p>
</li>
<li data-start="5937" data-end="5957">
<p data-start="5939" data-end="5957">Curriculum library</p>
</li>
<li data-start="5958" data-end="5988">
<p data-start="5960" data-end="5988">Multi-study admin dashboards</p>
</li>
<li data-start="5989" data-end="6000">
<p data-start="5991" data-end="6000">Analytics</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="6002" data-end="6005">
<h1 data-start="6007" data-end="6039">8. Your MVP Data Model Summary</h1>
<p data-start="6040" data-end="6084">If you remember nothing else, remember this:</p>

<ul data-start="6100" data-end="6162">
<li data-start="6100" data-end="6111">
<p data-start="6102" data-end="6111"><code data-start="6102" data-end="6111">studies</code></p>
</li>
<li data-start="6112" data-end="6125">
<p data-start="6114" data-end="6125"><code data-start="6114" data-end="6125">joinCodes</code></p>
</li>
<li data-start="6126" data-end="6162">
<p data-start="6128" data-end="6162"><code data-start="6128" data-end="6135">users</code> (optional but recommended)</p>
</li>
</ul>

<ul data-start="6183" data-end="6297">

</li>
<li data-start="6214" data-end="6243">
<p data-start="6216" data-end="6243"><code data-start="6216" data-end="6243">studies/{studyId}/members</code></p>
</li>
<li data-start="6244" data-end="6297">
<p data-start="6246" data-end="6297"><code data-start="6246" data-end="6269">users/{uid}/studyRefs</code> (optional but super useful)</p>
</li>
</ul>

<hr data-start="155" data-end="158">
<h1 data-start="160" data-end="192">CRUD Checklist by Screen (MVP)</h1>
<h2 data-start="194" data-end="225">Screen 1: Homepage (Landing)</h2>
<h3 data-start="226" data-end="235">Reads</h3>
<ul data-start="236" data-end="257">
<li data-start="236" data-end="257">
<p data-start="238" data-end="257">None required (MVP)</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 data-start="259" data-end="269">Writes</h3>
<ul data-start="270" data-end="276">
<li data-start="270" data-end="276">
<p data-start="272" data-end="276">None</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 data-start="278" data-end="287">Notes</h3>
<ul data-start="288" data-end="315">
<li data-start="288" data-end="315">
<p data-start="290" data-end="315">CTA  routes to <code data-start="306" data-end="315">/create</code></p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="317" data-end="320">
<h2 data-start="322" data-end="359">Screen 2: Quick Create (<code data-start="349" data-end="358">/create</code>)</h2>
<h3 data-start="360" data-end="376">On page load</h3>
<p data-start="377" data-end="385"><strong data-start="377" data-end="385">Auth</strong></p>
<ul data-start="386" data-end="430">
<li data-start="386" data-end="430">
<p data-start="388" data-end="430"> <code data-start="390" data-end="411">signInAnonymously()</code> if no current user</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 data-start="432" data-end="465">Writes (on Create My Study)</h3>
<ol data-start="466" data-end="485">
<li data-start="466" data-end="485">
<p data-start="469" data-end="485"><strong data-start="469" data-end="485">Create Study</strong></p>
</li>
</ol>
<ul data-start="486" data-end="635">
<li data-start="486" data-end="635">
<p data-start="488" data-end="509"><code data-start="488" data-end="507">studies/{studyId}</code></p>
<ul data-start="512" data-end="635">
<li data-start="512" data-end="635">
<p data-start="514" data-end="635"><code data-start="514" data-end="521">title</code>, <code data-start="523" data-end="533">schedule</code>, <code data-start="535" data-end="544">meeting</code>, <code data-start="546" data-end="557">startDate</code>, <code data-start="559" data-end="571">visibility</code> (default: <code data-start="582" data-end="592">unlisted</code>), <code data-start="595" data-end="609">createdByUid</code>, <code data-start="611" data-end="622">createdAt</code>, <code data-start="624" data-end="635">updatedAt</code></p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<ol start="2" data-start="637" data-end="672">
<li data-start="637" data-end="672">
<p data-start="640" data-end="672"><strong data-start="640" data-end="672">Create Membership for Leader</strong></p>
</li>
</ol>
<ul data-start="673" data-end="786">
<li data-start="673" data-end="786">
<p data-start="675" data-end="710"><code data-start="675" data-end="708">studies/{studyId}/members/{uid}</code></p>
<ul data-start="713" data-end="786">
<li data-start="713" data-end="786">
<p data-start="715" data-end="786"><code data-start="715" data-end="786">{ role: "leader", status: "active", displayName, photoURL, joinedAt }</code></p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<ol start="3" data-start="788" data-end="864">
<li data-start="788" data-end="864">
<p data-start="791" data-end="864"><strong data-start="791" data-end="864">Create First Session (optional but recommended for instant reality)</strong></p>
</li>
</ol>
<ul data-start="865" data-end="1009">
<li data-start="865" data-end="1009">
<p data-start="867" data-end="909"><code data-start="867" data-end="907">studies/{studyId}/sessions/{sessionId}</code></p>
<ul data-start="912" data-end="1009">
<li data-start="912" data-end="1009">
<p data-start="914" data-end="1009"><code data-start="914" data-end="1009">{ startsAt, title (optional), passage.reference (optional), agenda.questions: [], createdAt }</code></p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<ol start="4" data-start="1011" data-end="1042">
<li data-start="1011" data-end="1042">
<p data-start="1014" data-end="1042"><strong data-start="1014" data-end="1042">Create Join Code Mapping</strong></p>
</li>
</ol>
<ul data-start="1043" data-end="1108">
<li data-start="1043" data-end="1108">
<p data-start="1045" data-end="1065"><code data-start="1045" data-end="1063">joinCodes/{code}</code></p>
<ul data-start="1068" data-end="1108">
<li data-start="1068" data-end="1108">
<p data-start="1070" data-end="1108"><code data-start="1070" data-end="1108">{ studyId, createdAt, createdByUid }</code></p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<ol start="5" data-start="1110" data-end="1171">
<li data-start="1110" data-end="1171">
<p data-start="1113" data-end="1171"><strong data-start="1113" data-end="1171">(Optional but recommended) Create user study reference</strong></p>
</li>
</ol>
<ul data-start="1172" data-end="1295">
<li data-start="1172" data-end="1207">
<p data-start="1174" data-end="1207"><code data-start="1174" data-end="1187">users/{uid}</code> (create if missing)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1208" data-end="1295">
<p data-start="1210" data-end="1245"><code data-start="1210" data-end="1243">users/{uid}/studyRefs/{studyId}</code></p>
<ul data-start="1248" data-end="1295">
<li data-start="1248" data-end="1295">
<p data-start="1250" data-end="1295"><code data-start="1250" data-end="1295">{ role: "leader", joinedAt, titleSnapshot }</code></p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 data-start="1297" data-end="1306">Reads</h3>
<ul data-start="1307" data-end="1362">
<li data-start="1307" data-end="1362">
<p data-start="1309" data-end="1362">None required (unless you check join code uniqueness)</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 data-start="1364" data-end="1373">Notes</h3>
<ul data-start="1374" data-end="1553">
<li data-start="1374" data-end="1553">
<p data-start="1376" data-end="1419">Join code uniqueness strategy (simple MVP):</p>
<ul data-start="1422" data-end="1553">
<li data-start="1422" data-end="1445">
<p data-start="1424" data-end="1445">generate a short code</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1448" data-end="1484">
<p data-start="1450" data-end="1484">attempt <code data-start="1458" data-end="1484">setDoc(joinCodes/{code})</code></p>
</li>
<li data-start="1487" data-end="1553">
<p data-start="1489" data-end="1553">if already exists, generate another and retry (a couple times)</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="1555" data-end="1558">
<h2 data-start="1560" data-end="1639">Screen 3: Instant Win + Share (<code data-start="1594" data-end="1613">/created/:studyId</code> or <code data-start="1617" data-end="1638">/s/:studyId/welcome</code>)</h2>
<h3 data-start="1640" data-end="1649">Reads</h3>
<ul data-start="1650" data-end="1948">
<li data-start="1650" data-end="1694">
<p data-start="1652" data-end="1694"><code data-start="1652" data-end="1671">studies/{studyId}</code> (to display name/time)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1695" data-end="1948">
<p data-start="1697" data-end="1726">If you use join codes in URL:</p>
<ul data-start="1729" data-end="1948">
<li data-start="1729" data-end="1826">
<p data-start="1731" data-end="1826">either store <code data-start="1744" data-end="1754">joinCode</code> in the study doc OR fetch via a stored value you already have in memory</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1829" data-end="1948">
<p data-start="1831" data-end="1948">simplest: write <code data-start="1847" data-end="1887">studies/{studyId}.join.joinCode = code</code> during create, so this screen reads only <code data-start="1929" data-end="1948">studies/{studyId}</code></p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 data-start="1950" data-end="1960">Writes</h3>
<ul data-start="1961" data-end="1967">
<li data-start="1961" data-end="1967">
<p data-start="1963" data-end="1967">None</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 data-start="1969" data-end="1980">Actions</h3>
<ul data-start="1981" data-end="2159">
<li data-start="1981" data-end="2008">
<p data-start="1983" data-end="2008">Copy link (client-only)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2009" data-end="2159">
<p data-start="2011" data-end="2046">Continue with Google/Apple/Email:</p>
<ul data-start="2049" data-end="2159">
<li data-start="2049" data-end="2159">
<p data-start="2051" data-end="2159"><strong data-start="2051" data-end="2070">Link credential</strong> to the current anonymous user<br data-start="2100" data-end="2103">
(so uid stays the same and ownership remains intact)</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 data-start="2161" data-end="2170">Notes</h3>
<ul data-start="2171" data-end="2229">
<li data-start="2171" data-end="2229">
<p data-start="2173" data-end="2229">This is the save your study step  keep it lightweight</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="2231" data-end="2234">
<h2 data-start="2236" data-end="2286">Screen 4: Participant Join Page (<code data-start="2272" data-end="2285">/join/:code</code>)</h2>
<h3 data-start="2287" data-end="2306">Reads (on load)</h3>
<ol data-start="2307" data-end="2328">
<li data-start="2307" data-end="2328">
<p data-start="2310" data-end="2328">Resolve join code:</p>
</li>
</ol>
<ul data-start="2329" data-end="2367">
<li data-start="2329" data-end="2367">
<p data-start="2331" data-end="2367"><code data-start="2331" data-end="2349">joinCodes/{code}</code>  gives <code data-start="2358" data-end="2367">studyId</code></p>
</li>
</ul>
<ol start="2" data-start="2369" data-end="2395">
<li data-start="2369" data-end="2395">
<p data-start="2372" data-end="2395">Load study public info:</p>
</li>
</ol>
<ul data-start="2396" data-end="2493">
<li data-start="2396" data-end="2493">
<p data-start="2398" data-end="2419"><code data-start="2398" data-end="2417">studies/{studyId}</code></p>
<ul data-start="2422" data-end="2493">
<li data-start="2422" data-end="2493">
<p data-start="2424" data-end="2493">show title, schedule, meeting mode, description, next session reading</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<ol start="3" data-start="2495" data-end="2528">
<li data-start="2495" data-end="2528">
<p data-start="2498" data-end="2528">Load next session (optional)</p>
</li>
</ol>
<ul data-start="2529" data-end="2628">
<li data-start="2529" data-end="2628">
<p data-start="2531" data-end="2566">query: <code data-start="2538" data-end="2566">studies/{studyId}/sessions</code></p>
<ul data-start="2569" data-end="2628">
<li data-start="2569" data-end="2628">
<p data-start="2571" data-end="2628"><code data-start="2571" data-end="2590">orderBy(startsAt)</code>, <code data-start="2592" data-end="2616">where(startsAt &gt;= now)</code>, <code data-start="2618" data-end="2628">limit(1)</code></p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 data-start="2630" data-end="2679">Writes (when participant clicks Im coming)</h3>
<p data-start="2680" data-end="2688"><strong data-start="2680" data-end="2688">Auth</strong></p>
<ul data-start="2689" data-end="2769">
<li data-start="2689" data-end="2769">
<p data-start="2691" data-end="2769">If not signed in: <code data-start="2709" data-end="2730">signInAnonymously()</code> (or prompt login  MVP can allow anon)</p>
</li>
</ul>
<ol data-start="2771" data-end="2799">
<li data-start="2771" data-end="2799">
<p data-start="2774" data-end="2799">Create/update membership:</p>
</li>
</ol>
<ul data-start="2800" data-end="2903">
<li data-start="2800" data-end="2903">
<p data-start="2802" data-end="2837"><code data-start="2802" data-end="2835">studies/{studyId}/members/{uid}</code></p>
<ul data-start="2840" data-end="2903">
<li data-start="2840" data-end="2903">
<p data-start="2842" data-end="2903"><code data-start="2842" data-end="2903">{ role: "member", status: "active", displayName, joinedAt }</code></p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<ol start="2" data-start="2905" data-end="2940">
<li data-start="2905" data-end="2940">
<p data-start="2908" data-end="2940">(Optional) user study reference:</p>
</li>
</ol>
<ul data-start="2941" data-end="3028">
<li data-start="2941" data-end="3028">
<p data-start="2943" data-end="2978"><code data-start="2943" data-end="2976">users/{uid}/studyRefs/{studyId}</code></p>
<ul data-start="2981" data-end="3028">
<li data-start="2981" data-end="3028">
<p data-start="2983" data-end="3028"><code data-start="2983" data-end="3028">{ role: "member", joinedAt, titleSnapshot }</code></p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<ol start="3" data-start="3030" data-end="3070">
<li data-start="3030" data-end="3070">
<p data-start="3033" data-end="3070">(Optional) RSVP for the next session:</p>
</li>
</ol>
<ul data-start="3071" data-end="3172">
<li data-start="3071" data-end="3172">
<p data-start="3073" data-end="3125"><code data-start="3073" data-end="3125">studies/{studyId}/sessions/{sessionId}/rsvps/{uid}</code></p>
<ul data-start="3128" data-end="3172">
<li data-start="3128" data-end="3172">
<p data-start="3130" data-end="3172"><code data-start="3130" data-end="3172">{ status: "yes" | "maybe", respondedAt }</code></p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 data-start="3174" data-end="3183">Notes</h3>
<ul data-start="3184" data-end="3322">
<li data-start="3184" data-end="3322">
<p data-start="3186" data-end="3224">If you want <strong data-start="3198" data-end="3217">leader approval</strong> later:</p>
<ul data-start="3227" data-end="3322">
<li data-start="3227" data-end="3322">
<p data-start="3229" data-end="3322">write member doc with <code data-start="3251" data-end="3270">status: "pending"</code> if <code data-start="3274" data-end="3322">studies/{studyId}.join.requireApproval == true</code></p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="3324" data-end="3327">
<h2 data-start="3329" data-end="3374">Screen 5: Leader Dashboard (<code data-start="3360" data-end="3373">/s/:studyId</code>)</h2>
<h3 data-start="3375" data-end="3394">Reads (on load)</h3>
<ul data-start="3395" data-end="3656">
<li data-start="3395" data-end="3416">
<p data-start="3397" data-end="3416"><code data-start="3397" data-end="3416">studies/{studyId}</code></p>
</li>
<li data-start="3417" data-end="3470">
<p data-start="3419" data-end="3470"><code data-start="3419" data-end="3452">studies/{studyId}/members/{uid}</code> (to confirm role)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3471" data-end="3558">
<p data-start="3473" data-end="3498">Next sessions list (MVP):</p>
<ul data-start="3501" data-end="3558">
<li data-start="3501" data-end="3558">
<p data-start="3503" data-end="3558"><code data-start="3503" data-end="3531">studies/{studyId}/sessions</code> orderBy <code data-start="3540" data-end="3550">startsAt</code> limit 5</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="3559" data-end="3656">
<p data-start="3561" data-end="3580">Members list (MVP):</p>
<ul data-start="3583" data-end="3656">
<li data-start="3583" data-end="3656">
<p data-start="3585" data-end="3656"><code data-start="3585" data-end="3612">studies/{studyId}/members</code> orderBy <code data-start="3621" data-end="3631">joinedAt</code> (or just fetch first 50)</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 data-start="3658" data-end="3668">Writes</h3>
<p data-start="3669" data-end="3683"><strong data-start="3669" data-end="3683">Edit Study</strong></p>
<ul data-start="3684" data-end="3778">
<li data-start="3684" data-end="3778">
<p data-start="3686" data-end="3778">update <code data-start="3693" data-end="3712">studies/{studyId}</code> (title, description, schedule, meeting mode, zoomUrl, visibility)</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="3780" data-end="3795"><strong data-start="3780" data-end="3795">Add Session</strong></p>
<ul data-start="3796" data-end="3845">
<li data-start="3796" data-end="3845">
<p data-start="3798" data-end="3845">create <code data-start="3805" data-end="3845">studies/{studyId}/sessions/{sessionId}</code></p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="3847" data-end="3863"><strong data-start="3847" data-end="3863">Edit Session</strong></p>
<ul data-start="3864" data-end="3987">
<li data-start="3864" data-end="3987">
<p data-start="3866" data-end="3913">update <code data-start="3873" data-end="3913">studies/{studyId}/sessions/{sessionId}</code></p>
<ul data-start="3916" data-end="3987">
<li data-start="3916" data-end="3937">
<p data-start="3918" data-end="3937"><code data-start="3918" data-end="3937">passage.reference</code></p>
</li>
<li data-start="3940" data-end="3962">
<p data-start="3942" data-end="3962"><code data-start="3942" data-end="3962">agenda.questions[]</code></p>
</li>
<li data-start="3965" data-end="3987">
<p data-start="3967" data-end="3987"><code data-start="3967" data-end="3987">agenda.leaderNotes</code></p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="3989" data-end="4021"><strong data-start="3989" data-end="4021">Invite People (optional MVP)</strong></p>
<ul data-start="4022" data-end="4156">
<li data-start="4022" data-end="4072">
<p data-start="4024" data-end="4072">No DB write required if you only copy/share link</p>
</li>
<li data-start="4073" data-end="4156">
<p data-start="4075" data-end="4156">Later: store invites in <code data-start="4099" data-end="4126">studies/{studyId}/invites</code> and send emails via Functions</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="4158" data-end="4161">
<h2 data-start="4163" data-end="4235">Screen 6: During-Session Mode (<code data-start="4197" data-end="4234">/s/:studyId/session/:sessionId/live</code>)</h2>
<h3 data-start="4236" data-end="4245">Reads</h3>
<ul data-start="4246" data-end="4319">
<li data-start="4246" data-end="4267">
<p data-start="4248" data-end="4267"><code data-start="4248" data-end="4267">studies/{studyId}</code></p>
</li>
<li data-start="4268" data-end="4319">
<p data-start="4270" data-end="4319"><code data-start="4270" data-end="4292">sessions/{sessionId}</code> for agenda/questions/notes</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 data-start="4321" data-end="4344">Writes (live notes)</h3>
<ul data-start="4345" data-end="4535">
<li data-start="4345" data-end="4430">
<p data-start="4347" data-end="4430">update <code data-start="4354" data-end="4413">studies/{studyId}/sessions/{sessionId}.agenda.leaderNotes</code> (or <code data-start="4418" data-end="4429">liveNotes</code>)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="4431" data-end="4535">
<p data-start="4433" data-end="4459">optionally store separate:</p>
<ul data-start="4462" data-end="4535">
<li data-start="4462" data-end="4535">
<p data-start="4464" data-end="4535"><code data-start="4464" data-end="4501">sessions/{sessionId}/notes/{noteId}</code> (if you want collaboration later)</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 data-start="4537" data-end="4546">Notes</h3>
<ul data-start="4547" data-end="4602">
<li data-start="4547" data-end="4602">
<p data-start="4549" data-end="4602">MVP can keep this as a single editable notes field.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="4604" data-end="4607">
<h2 data-start="4609" data-end="4681">Screen 7: Post-Session Recap (<code data-start="4642" data-end="4680">/s/:studyId/session/:sessionId/recap</code>)</h2>
<h3 data-start="4682" data-end="4691">Reads</h3>
<ul data-start="4692" data-end="4716">
<li data-start="4692" data-end="4716">
<p data-start="4694" data-end="4716"><code data-start="4694" data-end="4716">sessions/{sessionId}</code></p>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 data-start="4718" data-end="4749">Writes (on Publish recap)</h3>
<ul data-start="4750" data-end="4860">
<li data-start="4750" data-end="4860">
<p data-start="4752" data-end="4860">update <code data-start="4759" data-end="4860">sessions/{sessionId}.recap = { summary, keyTakeaways[], prayerIntentions[], postedAt, postedByUid }</code></p>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 data-start="4862" data-end="4881">Optional writes</h3>
<ul data-start="4882" data-end="5004">
<li data-start="4882" data-end="5004">
<p data-start="4884" data-end="4921">If sending recap notifications later:</p>
<ul data-start="4924" data-end="5004">
<li data-start="4924" data-end="5004">
<p data-start="4926" data-end="5004">write <code data-start="4932" data-end="4973">sessions/{sessionId}/notifications/{id}</code> and have a Function pick it up</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="5006" data-end="5009">
<h1 data-start="5011" data-end="5060">The Minimum Firestore Rules Needed (Conceptual)</h1>
<p data-start="5061" data-end="5099">Just to align your CRUD with security:</p>
<ul data-start="5101" data-end="5416">
<li data-start="5101" data-end="5276">
<p data-start="5103" data-end="5115">Public read:</p>
<ul data-start="5118" data-end="5276">
<li data-start="5118" data-end="5138">
<p data-start="5120" data-end="5138"><code data-start="5120" data-end="5138">joinCodes/{code}</code></p>
</li>
<li data-start="5141" data-end="5211">
<p data-start="5143" data-end="5211"><code data-start="5143" data-end="5162">studies/{studyId}</code> <strong data-start="5163" data-end="5174">only if</strong> visibility is <code data-start="5189" data-end="5197">public</code> or <code data-start="5201" data-end="5211">unlisted</code></p>
</li>
<li data-start="5214" data-end="5276">
<p data-start="5216" data-end="5276">sessions: maybe only public fields (or require membership)</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="5277" data-end="5336">
<p data-start="5279" data-end="5297">Member read/write:</p>
<ul data-start="5300" data-end="5336">
<li data-start="5300" data-end="5336">
<p data-start="5302" data-end="5336">members can read sessions + recaps</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="5337" data-end="5416">
<p data-start="5339" data-end="5352">Leader write:</p>
<ul data-start="5355" data-end="5416">
<li data-start="5355" data-end="5416">
<p data-start="5357" data-end="5416">leaders can edit study + sessions + recaps + manage members</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="5418" data-end="5471">(If you want, I can draft real Firestore rules next.)</p>
<hr data-start="5473" data-end="5476">
<h1 data-start="5478" data-end="5537">MVP Implementation Order (fastest to something working)</h1>
<ol data-start="5538" data-end="5743">
<li data-start="5538" data-end="5591">
<p data-start="5541" data-end="5591">Anonymous auth + create study + joinCode mapping</p>
</li>
<li data-start="5592" data-end="5637">
<p data-start="5595" data-end="5637">Join page resolves code  displays study</p>
</li>
<li data-start="5638" data-end="5682">
<p data-start="5641" data-end="5682">Leader dashboard loads &amp; edits sessions</p>
</li>
<li data-start="5683" data-end="5701">
<p data-start="5686" data-end="5701">Recap posting</p>
</li>
<li data-start="5702" data-end="5743">
<p data-start="5705" data-end="5743">User studyRefs for My Studies list</p>
</li>
</ol>
