<hr data-start="2107" data-end="2110">
<h2 data-start="2112" data-end="2144">One-Page MVP PRD (copy/paste)</h2>
<p data-start="2146" data-end="2255"><strong data-start="2146" data-end="2165">Product vision:</strong> Make it simple for anyone to start, organize, and lead meaningful Bible study gatherings.</p>
<h3 data-start="2257" data-end="2274">MVP Goal (v1)</h3>
<p data-start="2275" data-end="2390">Enable a new leader to create a Bible study and share a join link in under 2 minutes, then plan and recap sessions.</p>
<h3 data-start="2392" data-end="2409">Primary Users</h3>
<ul data-start="2410" data-end="2480">
<li data-start="2410" data-end="2441">
<p data-start="2412" data-end="2441">Leader (creates/hosts/recaps)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2442" data-end="2480">
<p data-start="2444" data-end="2480">Participant (joins/prepares/reviews)</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 data-start="2482" data-end="2503">North Star Metric</h3>
<p data-start="2504" data-end="2586">% of new visitors who create a study and generate a share link in under 2 minutes.</p>
<h3 data-start="2588" data-end="2607">Core User Flows</h3>
<ol data-start="2608" data-end="2932">
<li data-start="2608" data-end="2701">
<p data-start="2611" data-end="2621"><strong data-start="2611" data-end="2621">Create</strong></p>
<ul data-start="2625" data-end="2701">
<li data-start="2625" data-end="2701">
<p data-start="2627" data-end="2701">Visitor  Start My Study  Quick Create  Study created  Share link shown</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="2702" data-end="2779">
<p data-start="2705" data-end="2713"><strong data-start="2705" data-end="2713">Join</strong></p>
<ul data-start="2717" data-end="2779">
<li data-start="2717" data-end="2779">
<p data-start="2719" data-end="2779">Participant opens <code data-start="2737" data-end="2750">/join/:code</code>  sees study details  joins</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="2780" data-end="2863">
<p data-start="2783" data-end="2791"><strong data-start="2783" data-end="2791">Plan</strong></p>
<ul data-start="2795" data-end="2863">
<li data-start="2795" data-end="2863">
<p data-start="2797" data-end="2863">Leader opens dashboard  sets passage + questions for next session</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="2864" data-end="2932">
<p data-start="2867" data-end="2876"><strong data-start="2867" data-end="2876">Recap</strong></p>
<ul data-start="2880" data-end="2932">
<li data-start="2880" data-end="2932">
<p data-start="2882" data-end="2932">Leader posts recap  participants can review later</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ol>
<h3 data-start="2934" data-end="2954">Features IN (v1)</h3>
<ul data-start="2955" data-end="3466">
<li data-start="2955" data-end="2986">
<p data-start="2957" data-end="2986">Anonymous create first flow</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2987" data-end="3064">
<p data-start="2989" data-end="3064">Create Study: name, schedule, start date, meeting mode + optional zoom link</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3065" data-end="3092">
<p data-start="3067" data-end="3092">Auto-create first session</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3093" data-end="3134">
<p data-start="3095" data-end="3134">Shareable join link (join code mapping)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3135" data-end="3189">
<p data-start="3137" data-end="3189">Join page: display basic info + next session reading</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3190" data-end="3220">
<p data-start="3192" data-end="3220">Membership: leader + members</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3221" data-end="3385">
<p data-start="3223" data-end="3240">Leader dashboard:</p>
<ul data-start="3243" data-end="3385">
<li data-start="3243" data-end="3262">
<p data-start="3245" data-end="3262">edit study basics</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3265" data-end="3324">
<p data-start="3267" data-end="3324">create/edit sessions (passage + questions + leader notes)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3327" data-end="3385">
<p data-start="3329" data-end="3385">post recap (summary + key takeaways + prayer intentions)</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="3386" data-end="3466">
<p data-start="3388" data-end="3466">Basic My Studies list (optional but recommended via <code data-start="3442" data-end="3465">users/{uid}/studyRefs</code>)</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 data-start="3468" data-end="3492">Features OUT (later)</h3>
<ul data-start="3493" data-end="3662">
<li data-start="3493" data-end="3514">
<p data-start="3495" data-end="3514">Attendance tracking</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3515" data-end="3528">
<p data-start="3517" data-end="3528">In-app chat</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3529" data-end="3570">
<p data-start="3531" data-end="3570">Curriculum library / course marketplace</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3571" data-end="3602">
<p data-start="3573" data-end="3602">AI-generated questions/agenda</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3603" data-end="3624">
<p data-start="3605" data-end="3624">Parish admin portal</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3625" data-end="3645">
<p data-start="3627" data-end="3645">Payments/donations</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3646" data-end="3662">
<p data-start="3648" data-end="3662">Deep analytics</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 data-start="3664" data-end="3688">Data Model (summary)</h3>
<ul data-start="3689" data-end="3871">
<li data-start="3689" data-end="3710">
<p data-start="3691" data-end="3710"><code data-start="3691" data-end="3710">studies/{studyId}</code></p>
</li>
<li data-start="3711" data-end="3753">
<p data-start="3713" data-end="3753"><code data-start="3713" data-end="3753">studies/{studyId}/sessions/{sessionId}</code></p>
</li>
<li data-start="3754" data-end="3789">
<p data-start="3756" data-end="3789"><code data-start="3756" data-end="3789">studies/{studyId}/members/{uid}</code></p>
</li>
<li data-start="3790" data-end="3825">
<p data-start="3792" data-end="3825"><code data-start="3792" data-end="3825">joinCodes/{code} -&gt; { studyId }</code></p>
</li>
<li data-start="3826" data-end="3871">
<p data-start="3828" data-end="3871">optional: <code data-start="3838" data-end="3871">users/{uid}/studyRefs/{studyId}</code></p>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 data-start="3873" data-end="3886">Non-Goals</h3>
<ul data-start="3887" data-end="3979">
<li data-start="3887" data-end="3919">
<p data-start="3889" data-end="3919">Replace church/parish websites</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3920" data-end="3948">
<p data-start="3922" data-end="3948">Create theological content</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3949" data-end="3979">
<p data-start="3951" data-end="3979">Become a full social network</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 data-start="3981" data-end="4004">Risks / Constraints</h3>
<ul data-start="4005" data-end="4195">
<li data-start="4005" data-end="4059">
<p data-start="4007" data-end="4059">Keep create friction near zero (avoid signup wall)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="4060" data-end="4124">
<p data-start="4062" data-end="4124">Privacy controls (public vs unlisted vs private) must be clear</p>
</li>
<li data-start="4125" data-end="4195">
<p data-start="4127" data-end="4195">Security rules must prevent non-leaders from editing sessions/recaps</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 data-start="4197" data-end="4218">Parking Lot Ideas</h3>
<ul data-start="4219" data-end="4390">
<li data-start="4219" data-end="4242">
<p data-start="4221" data-end="4242">Reminders (email/SMS)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="4243" data-end="4265">
<p data-start="4245" data-end="4265">Attendance + streaks</p>
</li>
<li data-start="4266" data-end="4292">
<p data-start="4268" data-end="4292">Shared participant notes</p>
</li>
<li data-start="4293" data-end="4326">
<p data-start="4295" data-end="4326">AI-assisted question generation</p>
</li>
<li data-start="4327" data-end="4390">
<p data-start="4329" data-end="4390">Study templates (Lectio Divina, Gospel study, topical series)</p>
</li>
</ul>

<h3 data-start="2487" data-end="2515">Why this structure works</h3>
<ul data-start="2516" data-end="2787">
<li data-start="2516" data-end="2616">
<p data-start="2518" data-end="2616"><strong data-start="2518" data-end="2553">Routes mirror your product flow</strong> (<code data-start="2555" data-end="2615">/create  /created/[studyId]  /join/[code]  /s/[studyId]</code>)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2617" data-end="2680">
<p data-start="2619" data-end="2680"><code data-start="2619" data-end="2635">lib/services/*</code> contains your CRUD logic (keeps pages clean)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2681" data-end="2746">
<p data-start="2683" data-end="2746"><code data-start="2683" data-end="2696">lib/model/*</code> keeps Firestore documents consistent (fewer bugs)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2747" data-end="2787">
<p data-start="2749" data-end="2787">UI components stay simple and reusable</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="2789" data-end="2792">
<h1 data-start="2794" data-end="2833">Routes and what they do (MVP mapping)</h1>
<h3 data-start="2835" data-end="2849"><code data-start="2839" data-end="2842">/</code> (Home)</h3>
<ul data-start="2850" data-end="2867">
<li data-start="2850" data-end="2867">
<p data-start="2852" data-end="2867">CTA  <code data-start="2858" data-end="2867">/create</code></p>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 data-start="2869" data-end="2882"><code data-start="2873" data-end="2882">/create</code></h3>
<ul data-start="2883" data-end="2973">
<li data-start="2883" data-end="2907">
<p data-start="2885" data-end="2907">Ensures anonymous auth</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2908" data-end="2973">
<p data-start="2910" data-end="2973">On submit: <code data-start="2921" data-end="2936">createStudy()</code> then redirect  <code data-start="2953" data-end="2973">/created/{studyId}</code></p>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 data-start="2975" data-end="2999"><code data-start="2979" data-end="2999">/created/[studyId]</code></h3>
<ul data-start="3000" data-end="3104">
<li data-start="3000" data-end="3017">
<p data-start="3002" data-end="3017">Loads study doc</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3018" data-end="3052">
<p data-start="3020" data-end="3052">Shows share link: <code data-start="3038" data-end="3052">/join/{code}</code></p>
</li>
<li data-start="3053" data-end="3104">
<p data-start="3055" data-end="3104">Buttons to save (link Google/Apple/Email later)</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 data-start="3106" data-end="3124"><code data-start="3110" data-end="3124">/join/[code]</code></h3>
<ul data-start="3125" data-end="3217">
<li data-start="3125" data-end="3150">
<p data-start="3127" data-end="3150">Resolves code  studyId</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3151" data-end="3179">
<p data-start="3153" data-end="3179">Loads study + next session</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3180" data-end="3217">
<p data-start="3182" data-end="3217">Im coming  <code data-start="3197" data-end="3217">joinStudy(studyId)</code></p>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 data-start="3219" data-end="3237"><code data-start="3223" data-end="3237">/s/[studyId]</code></h3>
<ul data-start="3238" data-end="3316">
<li data-start="3238" data-end="3272">
<p data-start="3240" data-end="3272">Loads study + sessions + members</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3273" data-end="3316">
<p data-start="3275" data-end="3316">Leader actions: edit sessions, post recap</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 data-start="3318" data-end="3361"><code data-start="3322" data-end="3361">/s/[studyId]/session/[sessionId]/live</code></h3>
<ul data-start="3362" data-end="3399">
<li data-start="3362" data-end="3399">
<p data-start="3364" data-end="3399">Show agenda/questions + notes field</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 data-start="3401" data-end="3445"><code data-start="3405" data-end="3445">/s/[studyId]/session/[sessionId]/recap</code></h3>
<ul data-start="3446" data-end="3468">
<li data-start="3446" data-end="3468">
<p data-start="3448" data-end="3468">Edit recap + publish</p>
</li>
</ul>

Implement routes:
- / (landing with CTA to /create)
- /create (quick create form; signs in anonymously; creates a study, leader membership, join code mapping, and first session in Firestore)
- /created/[studyId] (loads the created study; displays the share link /join/[code]; copy-to-clipboard button)
- /join/[code] (resolves join code to studyId; loads study and next session; button to join)

Add Firebase client setup:
- src/lib/firebase/client.ts initializes firebase app, auth, firestore
- src/lib/firebase/auth.ts contains ensureAnonymousAuth() and placeholders for provider linking
- src/lib/services/studies.ts contains createStudy() and getStudy()
- src/lib/services/join.ts contains resolveJoinCode() and joinStudy()

Use environment variables for Firebase config and provide .env.local.example.
Keep UI simple with basic components in src/components/ui.
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>

<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="1009" data-end="1798"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">ts</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-j9921kii.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copy code</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-ts"><span><span><span class="hljs-comment">//  Firebase client init (browser only)</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment">//  Keep this file tiny and boring.</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> { initializeApp, getApps } </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"firebase/app"</span></span><span>;
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> { getAuth } </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"firebase/auth"</span></span><span>;
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> { getFirestore } </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"firebase/firestore"</span></span><span>;

  </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">authDomain</span></span><span>: process.</span><span><span class="hljs-property">env</span></span><span>.</span><span><span class="hljs-property">NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_AUTH_DOMAIN</span></span><span>!,
  </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">projectId</span></span><span>: process.</span><span><span class="hljs-property">env</span></span><span>.</span><span><span class="hljs-property">NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_PROJECT_ID</span></span><span>!,
  </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">storageBucket</span></span><span>: process.</span><span><span class="hljs-property">env</span></span><span>.</span><span><span class="hljs-property">NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_STORAGE_BUCKET</span></span><span>!,
  </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">messagingSenderId</span></span><span>: process.</span><span><span class="hljs-property">env</span></span><span>.</span><span><span class="hljs-property">NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_MESSAGING_SENDER_ID</span></span><span>!,
  </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">appId</span></span><span>: process.</span><span><span class="hljs-property">env</span></span><span>.</span><span><span class="hljs-property">NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_APP_ID</span></span><span>!,
};

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">export</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">const</span></span><span> app = </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">getApps</span></span><span>().</span><span><span class="hljs-property">length</span></span><span> ? </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">getApps</span></span><span>()[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>] : </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">initializeApp</span></span><span>(firebaseConfig);

</span></span></code></div></div></pre>

<h2 data-start="1805" data-end="1832">3) Anonymous auth helper</h2>
<h3 data-start="1834" data-end="1864"><code data-start="1838" data-end="1864">src/lib/firebase/auth.ts</code></h3>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="1865" data-end="2648"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">ts</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-j9921kii.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copy code</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-ts"><span><span><span class="hljs-string">"use client"</span></span><span>;

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment">//  Auth helpers</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> { auth } </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"./client"</span></span><span>;
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> { signInAnonymously, onAuthStateChanged, </span><span><span class="hljs-title class_">User</span></span><span> } </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"firebase/auth"</span></span><span>;

<span class="hljs-comment">/**
 *  Ensure we have a Firebase user (anonymous is fine for MVP)
 *  This powers "create first, login later"
 */</span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">export</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">async</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">ensureAnonymousAuth</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params"></span></span><span>): </span><span><span class="hljs-title class_">Promise</span></span><span>&lt;</span><span><span class="hljs-title class_">User</span></span><span>&gt; {
  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment">// If already signed in, reuse it </span></span><span>
  </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> (auth.</span><span><span class="hljs-property">currentUser</span></span><span>) </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> auth.</span><span><span class="hljs-property">currentUser</span></span><span>;

  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment">// Wait briefly for Firebase to hydrate auth state </span></span><span>
  </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">const</span></span><span> hydrated = </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">await</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">new</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title class_">Promise</span></span><span>&lt;</span><span><span class="hljs-title class_">User</span></span><span> | </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">null</span></span><span>&gt;(</span><span><span class="hljs-function">(<span class="hljs-params">resolve</span></span></span><span>) =&gt; {
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">const</span></span><span> unsub = </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">onAuthStateChanged</span></span><span>(auth, </span><span><span class="hljs-function">(<span class="hljs-params">u</span></span></span><span>) =&gt; {
      </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">unsub</span></span><span>();
      </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">resolve</span></span><span>(u);
    });
  });

  </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> (hydrated) </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> hydrated;

  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment">// Otherwise sign in anonymously </span></span><span>
  </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">const</span></span><span> cred = </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">await</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">signInAnonymously</span></span><span>(auth);
  </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> cred.</span><span><span class="hljs-property">user</span></span><span>;
}
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>

<h2 data-start="4109" data-end="4143">5) Utility: join code generator</h2>
<h3 data-start="4145" data-end="4176"><code data-start="4149" data-end="4176">src/lib/utils/joinCode.ts</code></h3>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="4177" data-end="4552"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">ts</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-j9921kii.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copy code</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-ts"><span><span><span class="hljs-comment">//  Generates short join codes like "k3m9q2"</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment">//  Not cryptographically secure (fine for MVP)</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">export</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">makeJoinCode</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">length = <span class="hljs-number">6</span></span></span><span>): </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">string</span></span><span> {
  </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">const</span></span><span> alphabet = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"abcdefghjkmnpqrstuvwxyz23456789"</span></span><span>; </span><span><span class="hljs-comment">// no confusing chars </span></span><span>
  </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">let</span></span><span> out = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">""</span></span><span>;
  </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> (</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">let</span></span><span> i = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>; i &lt; length; i++) {
    out += alphabet[</span><span><span class="hljs-title class_">Math</span></span><span>.</span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">floor</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-title class_">Math</span></span><span>.</span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">random</span></span><span>() * alphabet.</span><span><span class="hljs-property">length</span></span><span>)];
  }
  </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> out;
}
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>

<h2 data-start="4559" data-end="4605">6) Utility: compute first session date/time</h2>
<h3 data-start="4607" data-end="4634"><code data-start="4611" data-end="4634">src/lib/utils/date.ts</code></h3>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="4635" data-end="5139"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">ts</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-j9921kii.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copy code</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-ts"><span><span><span class="hljs-comment">/**
 *  Compute the first session Date from startDate + timeLocal
 * startDate: "YYYY-MM-DD"
 * timeLocal: "HH:mm"
 *
 * Note: This uses the user's local timezone in the browser.
 * For MVP this is OK; later we can normalize with timezone-aware logic.
 */</span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">export</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">firstSessionDate</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params"><span class="hljs-attr">startDate</span></span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">string</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">timeLocal</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">string</span></span><span>): </span><span><span class="hljs-title class_">Date</span></span><span> {
  </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">const</span></span><span> [y, m, d] = startDate.</span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">split</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"-"</span></span><span>).</span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">map</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-title class_">Number</span></span><span>);
  </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">const</span></span><span> [hh, mm] = timeLocal.</span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">split</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">":"</span></span><span>).</span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">map</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-title class_">Number</span></span><span>);
  </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">new</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title class_">Date</span></span><span>(y, (m - </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>), d, hh, mm, </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>);
}
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>

<h3 data-start="5194" data-end="5227"><code data-start="5198" data-end="5227">src/lib/services/studies.ts</code></h3>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="5228" data-end="8662"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">ts</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-j9921kii.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copy code</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-ts"><span><span><span class="hljs-string">"use client"</span></span><span>;

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> { db } </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"@/lib/firebase/client"</span></span><span>;
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> { </span><span><span class="hljs-title class_">Study</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-title class_">Member</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-title class_">Session</span></span><span> } </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"@/lib/model/types"</span></span><span>;
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> { makeJoinCode } </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"@/lib/utils/joinCode"</span></span><span>;
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> { firstSessionDate } </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"@/lib/utils/date"</span></span><span>;

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> {
  addDoc,
  collection,
  doc,
  getDoc,
  serverTimestamp,
  setDoc,
  </span><span><span class="hljs-title class_">Timestamp</span></span><span>,
  updateDoc,
} </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"firebase/firestore"</span></span><span>;

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">export</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">type</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title class_">CreateStudyInput</span></span><span> = {
  </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">title</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">string</span></span><span>;
  </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">dayOfWeek</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">number</span></span><span>;
  </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">timeLocal</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">string</span></span><span>;        </span><span><span class="hljs-comment">// "19:00"</span></span><span>
  </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">timezone</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">string</span></span><span>;         </span><span><span class="hljs-comment">// "America/Los_Angeles"</span></span><span>
  </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">startDate</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">string</span></span><span>;        </span><span><span class="hljs-comment">// "YYYY-MM-DD"</span></span><span>
  </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">meetingMode</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"online"</span></span><span> | </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"in_person"</span></span><span> | </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"hybrid"</span></span><span>;
  </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">zoomUrl</span></span><span>?: </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">string</span></span><span>;
};

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">async</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">createJoinCodeMapping</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params"><span class="hljs-attr">studyId</span></span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">string</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">uid</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">string</span></span><span>): </span><span><span class="hljs-title class_">Promise</span></span><span>&lt;</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">string</span></span><span>&gt; {
  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment">//  Retry a few times if code collision occurs</span></span><span>
  </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> (</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">let</span></span><span> attempt = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>; attempt &lt; </span><span><span class="hljs-number">6</span></span><span>; attempt++) {
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">const</span></span><span> code = </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">makeJoinCode</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">6</span></span><span>);
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">const</span></span><span> codeRef = </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">doc</span></span><span>(db, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"joinCodes"</span></span><span>, code);

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">try</span></span><span> {
      </span><span><span class="hljs-comment">// Use setDoc; collision check is: if doc exists, throw manually by reading</span></span><span>
      </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">const</span></span><span> existing = </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">await</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">getDoc</span></span><span>(codeRef);
      </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> (existing.</span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">exists</span></span><span>()) </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">continue</span></span><span>;

      </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">await</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">setDoc</span></span><span>(codeRef, {
        studyId,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">createdAt</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">serverTimestamp</span></span><span>(),
        </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">createdByUid</span></span><span>: uid,
      });

      </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> code;
    } </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">catch</span></span><span> {
      </span><span><span class="hljs-comment">// try again</span></span><span>
    }
  }
  </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">throw</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">new</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title class_">Error</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Could not generate a unique join code. Please try again."</span></span><span>);
}

<span class="hljs-comment">/**
 *  Creates:
 * - studies/{studyId}
 * - studies/{studyId}/members/{uid} (leader)
 * - studies/{studyId}/sessions/{sessionId} (first session)
 * - joinCodes/{code} -&gt; studyId
 */</span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">export</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">async</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">createStudy</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params"><span class="hljs-attr">uid</span></span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">string</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">input</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-title class_">CreateStudyInput</span></span><span>): </span><span><span class="hljs-title class_">Promise</span></span><span>&lt;{ </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">studyId</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">string</span></span><span>; </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">joinCode</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">string</span></span><span>; }&gt; {
  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment">// 1) Create study doc </span></span><span>
  </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">const</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">studyBase</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-title class_">Omit</span></span><span>&lt;</span><span><span class="hljs-title class_">Study</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"join"</span></span><span>&gt; = {
    </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">title</span></span><span>: input.</span><span><span class="hljs-property">title</span></span><span>,
    </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">visibility</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"unlisted"</span></span><span>,
    </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">schedule</span></span><span>: {
      </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">cadence</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"weekly"</span></span><span>,
      </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">dayOfWeek</span></span><span>: input.</span><span><span class="hljs-property">dayOfWeek</span></span><span>,
      </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">timeLocal</span></span><span>: input.</span><span><span class="hljs-property">timeLocal</span></span><span>,
      </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">timezone</span></span><span>: input.</span><span><span class="hljs-property">timezone</span></span><span>,
    },
    </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">startDate</span></span><span>: input.</span><span><span class="hljs-property">startDate</span></span><span>,
    </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">meeting</span></span><span>: {
      </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">mode</span></span><span>: input.</span><span><span class="hljs-property">meetingMode</span></span><span>,
      </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">zoomUrl</span></span><span>: input.</span><span><span class="hljs-property">zoomUrl</span></span><span> || </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">undefined</span></span><span>,
    },
    </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">createdByUid</span></span><span>: uid,
    </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">createdAt</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">serverTimestamp</span></span><span>(),
    </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">updatedAt</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">serverTimestamp</span></span><span>(),
  };

  </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">const</span></span><span> studyRef = </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">await</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">addDoc</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">collection</span></span><span>(db, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"studies"</span></span><span>), {
    ...studyBase,
    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment">// join gets filled after we generate code </span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">join</span></span><span>: { </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">joinCode</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">""</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">requireApproval</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">false</span></span><span> },
  });

  </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">const</span></span><span> studyId = studyRef.</span><span><span class="hljs-property">id</span></span><span>;

  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment">// 2) Create leader membership </span></span><span>
  </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">const</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">member</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-title class_">Member</span></span><span> = {
    </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">role</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"leader"</span></span><span>,
    </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">status</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"active"</span></span><span>,

<h1 data-start="771" data-end="794">Copy-paste ready docs</h1>
<p data-start="796" data-end="850">Create a <code data-start="805" data-end="812">/docs</code> folder, then add the following files.</p>
<hr data-start="852" data-end="855">
<h2 data-start="857" data-end="877"><code data-start="860" data-end="877">/docs/vision.md</code></h2>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="879" data-end="1725"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">md</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-j9921kii.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copy code</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-md"><span><span><span class="hljs-section"># Product Vision</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-strong">**Make it simple for anyone to start, organize, and lead meaningful Bible study gatherings.**</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-section">## Core Idea</span></span><span>

Many people feel called to start a Bible study but never do because:

</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">-</span></span><span> Planning feels overwhelming  
</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">-</span></span><span> Logistics are unclear  
</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">-</span></span><span> Leading feels intimidating  

This product removes those barriers and makes starting a Bible study feel:

</span><span><span class="hljs-quote">&gt; simple, peaceful, and immediately real.</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-section">## Transformation</span></span><span>

From:
</span><span><span class="hljs-quote">&gt; I should start a Bible study someday</span></span><span>

To:
</span><span><span class="hljs-quote">&gt; My Bible study exists. People are coming.</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-section">## Guiding Principles</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">-</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-strong">**Simplicity first**</span></span><span>  fewer clicks, less friction  
</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">-</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-strong">**Create before login**</span></span><span>  remove psychological barriers  
</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">-</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-strong">**Support real ministry**</span></span><span>  not just scheduling software  
</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">-</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-strong">**Encourage community**</span></span><span>  Scripture encountered together  
</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">-</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-strong">**Calm, prayerful UX**</span></span><span>  never noisy or corporate
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<hr data-start="1727" data-end="1730">
<h2 data-start="1732" data-end="1753"><code data-start="1735" data-end="1753">/docs/mvp-prd.md</code></h2>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="1755" data-end="3248"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">md</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-j9921kii.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copy code</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-md"><span><span><span class="hljs-section"># MVP Product Requirements (v1)</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-section">## Goal</span></span><span>

Enable a new leader to:

</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">1.</span></span><span> Create a Bible study  
</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">2.</span></span><span> Share a join link  
</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">3.</span></span><span> Plan sessions  
</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">4.</span></span><span> Post recaps  

All within a </span><span><span class="hljs-strong">**simple, peaceful experience**</span></span><span>.

</span><span><span class="hljs-section">## North Star Metric</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-strong">**% of visitors who create a study and generate a share link in under 2 minutes.**</span></span><span>

---

</span><span><span class="hljs-section">## Core User Roles</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-section">### Leader</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">-</span></span><span> Creates study
</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">-</span></span><span> Plans sessions
</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">-</span></span><span> Leads discussion
</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">-</span></span><span> Posts recap

</span><span><span class="hljs-section">### Participant</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">-</span></span><span> Joins study
</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">-</span></span><span> Prepares with reading/questions
</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">-</span></span><span> Reviews recap

---

</span><span><span class="hljs-section">## Core User Flows</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-section">### 1. Create</span></span><span>
Landing  Quick Create  Study created  Share link shown

</span><span><span class="hljs-section">### 2. Join</span></span><span>
Join link  View study  Join  Become member

</span><span><span class="hljs-section">### 3. Plan</span></span><span>
Leader dashboard  Edit session passage + questions

</span><span><span class="hljs-section">### 4. Recap</span></span><span>
Leader posts summary  Members review later

---

</span><span><span class="hljs-section">## Features IN (v1)</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">-</span></span><span> Anonymous create flow  
</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">-</span></span><span> Study creation (title, schedule, meeting mode, start date)  
</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">-</span></span><span> Shareable join link  
</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">-</span></span><span> Join page + membership  
</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">-</span></span><span> Sessions list  
</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">-</span></span><span> Edit session:
</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">  -</span></span><span> Scripture reference  
</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">  -</span></span><span> Discussion questions  
</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">  -</span></span><span> Leader notes  
</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">-</span></span><span> Post-session recap:
</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">  -</span></span><span> Summary  
</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">  -</span></span><span> Key takeaways  
</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">  -</span></span><span> Prayer intentions  

---

</span><span><span class="hljs-section">## Features OUT (later)</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">-</span></span><span> Attendance tracking  
</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">-</span></span><span> Chat/messaging  
</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">-</span></span><span> Curriculum marketplace  
</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">-</span></span><span> AI-generated questions  
</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">-</span></span><span> Parish dashboards  
</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">-</span></span><span> Payments/donations  
</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">-</span></span><span> Deep analytics  

---

</span><span><span class="hljs-section">## Non-Goals</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">-</span></span><span> Replace church websites  
</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">-</span></span><span> Provide theological authority  
</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">-</span></span><span> Become a social network  

This is a </span><span><span class="hljs-strong">**ministry tool**</span></span><span>, not a platform for attention.
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<hr data-start="3250" data-end="3253">
<h2 data-start="3255" data-end="3279"><code data-start="3258" data-end="3279">/docs/data-model.md</code></h2>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="3281" data-end="4404"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">md</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-j9921kii.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copy code</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-md"><span><span><span class="hljs-section"># Data Model Overview (Firestore)</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-section">## Top-Level Collections</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-section">### studies/{studyId}</span></span><span>

Core Bible study group.

Fields:
</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">-</span></span><span> title  
</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">-</span></span><span> description  
</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">-</span></span><span> visibility  
</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">-</span></span><span> schedule { cadence, dayOfWeek, timeLocal, timezone }  
</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">-</span></span><span> startDate  
</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">-</span></span><span> meeting { mode, zoomUrl, locationName, address }  
</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">-</span></span><span> join { joinCode, requireApproval }  
</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">-</span></span><span> createdByUid  
</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">-</span></span><span> timestamps  

---

</span><span><span class="hljs-section">### joinCodes/{code}</span></span><span>

Maps short code  studyId.

Used for fast </span><span><span class="hljs-code">`/join/:code`</span></span><span> resolution.

---

</span><span><span class="hljs-section">### users/{uid} (optional but recommended)</span></span><span>

Basic user profile + study references.

---

</span><span><span class="hljs-section">## Subcollections</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-section">### studies/{studyId}/members/{uid}</span></span><span>

Tracks:
</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">-</span></span><span> role (leader, co<span class="hljs-emphasis">_leader, member)  
- status (active, pending, removed)  
- joinedAt  

---

### studies/{studyId}/sessions/{sessionId}

Tracks:

</span></span><span><span class="hljs-strong">**Before meeting**</span></span><span>
- startsAt  
- passage.reference  
- agenda.questions[]  
- leaderNotes  

</span><span><span class="hljs-strong">**After meeting**</span></span><span>
- recap.summary  
- recap.keyTakeaways[]  
- recap.prayerIntentions[]  
- recap.postedAt  

---

## Design Philosophy

- </span><span><span class="hljs-strong">**Study-centric structure**</span></span><span>  
- </span><span><span class="hljs-strong">**Simple reads for MVP**</span></span><span>  
- </span><span><span class="hljs-strong">**Expandable without migrations**</span></span><span>  
- </span><span><span class="hljs-strong">**Security-rule friendly**</span></span><span>
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<hr data-start="4406" data-end="4409">

    postedAt?: Timestamp;
    postedByUid?: string;
  };
};

export async function listSessions(studyId: string): Promise&lt;SessionDoc[]&gt; {
  const q = query(
    collection(getFirebaseDb(), "studies", studyId, "sessions"),
    orderBy("startsAt", "asc")
  );
  const snap = await getDocs(q);
  return snap.docs.map((d) =&gt; ({ id: d.id, ...(d.data() as any) }));
}

export async function getSession(studyId: string, sessionId: string): Promise&lt;SessionDoc | null&gt; {
  const snap = await getDoc(doc(getFirebaseDb(), "studies", studyId, "sessions", sessionId));
  if (!snap.exists()) return null;
  return { id: snap.id, ...(snap.data() as any) };
}

export async function updateSessionBasics(
  studyId: string,
  sessionId: string,
  payload: {
    passageRef: string;
    questions: string[];
    leaderNotes: string;
  }
) {
  await updateDoc(doc(getFirebaseDb(), "studies", studyId, "sessions", sessionId), {
    "passage.reference": payload.passageRef,
    "agenda.questions": payload.questions,
    "agenda.leaderNotes": payload.leaderNotes,
    updatedAt: serverTimestamp(),
  });
}

export async function postRecap(
  studyId: string,
  sessionId: string,
  uid: string,
  payload: {
    summary: string;
    keyTakeaways: string[];
    prayerIntentions: string[];
  }
) {
  await updateDoc(doc(getFirebaseDb(), "studies", studyId, "sessions", sessionId), {
    recap: {
      summary: payload.summary,
      keyTakeaways: payload.keyTakeaways,
      prayerIntentions: payload.prayerIntentions,
      postedAt: serverTimestamp(),
      postedByUid: uid,
    },
    updatedAt: serverTimestamp(),
  });
}</div></div></div></div></div><div class="z-0 flex justify-end"><div class="touch:-me-2 touch:-ms-3.5 -ms-2.5 -me-1 flex flex-wrap items-center gap-y-4 p-1 select-none focus-within:transition-none <h1 data-start="758" data-end="809">One improvement I recommend (small but important)</h1>

<h2 data-start="121" data-end="136">Short answer</h2>
<p data-start="137" data-end="190"><strong data-start="137" data-end="190">Yes. Literally create a folder named <code data-start="176" data-end="187">[studyId]</code>.</strong></p>
<p data-start="192" data-end="250">Brackets are <strong data-start="205" data-end="249">intentional syntax in Next.js App Router</strong>.</p>
<p data-start="252" data-end="262">They mean:</p>
<blockquote data-start="264" data-end="300">
<p data-start="266" data-end="300">This part of the URL is dynamic.</p>
</blockquote>
<hr data-start="302" data-end="305">
<h1 data-start="307" data-end="349">What this looks like in your file system</h1>
<p data-start="351" data-end="371">Inside your project:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="373" data-end="433"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">css</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-j9921kii.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copy code</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">src</span></span><span>/
  app/
    s/
      </span><span><span class="hljs-selector-attr">[studyId]</span></span><span>/
        </span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">page</span></span><span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.tsx</span></span><span>
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="435" data-end="485">That folder name <strong data-start="452" data-end="484">includes the square brackets</strong>.</p>
<p data-start="487" data-end="563">You are not replacing it with a real ID.<br data-start="527" data-end="530">
Next.js does that <strong data-start="548" data-end="562">at runtime</strong>.</p>

"use client";

import Link from "next/link";
import { useEffect, useMemo, useState } from "react";
import { useParams } from "next/navigation";
import { getStudy } from "@/lib/services/studies";
import { listSessions, SessionDoc } from "@/lib/services/sessions";
import { Button } from "@/components/ui/Button";

function fmt(ts?: any) {
  if (!ts?.toDate) return "";
  return ts.toDate().toLocaleString([], {
    weekday: "short",
    month: "short",
    day: "numeric",
    hour: "numeric",
    minute: "2-digit",
  });
}

export default function StudyDashboard() {
  const params = useParams&lt;{ studyId: string }&gt;();
  const studyId = params.studyId;

  const [study, setStudy] = useState&lt;any&gt;(null);
  const [sessions, setSessions] = useState&lt;SessionDoc[]&gt;([]);
  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);

  const nextSession = useMemo(() =&gt; {
    const now = new Date();
    return (
      sessions.find((s) =&gt; {
        const d = s.startsAt?.toDate?.();
        return d ? d &gt;= now : false;
      }) ?? sessions[0]
    );
  }, [sessions]);

  useEffect(() =&gt; {
    (async () =&gt; {
      setLoading(true);
      const s = await getStudy(studyId);
      const sess = await listSessions(studyId);
      setStudy(s);
      setSessions(sess);
      setLoading(false);
    })();
  }, [studyId]);

  if (loading) return &lt;main&gt;Loading...&lt;/main&gt;;
  if (!study) return &lt;main&gt;Study not found.&lt;/main&gt;;

  return (
    &lt;main style={{ maxWidth: 760 }}&gt;
      &lt;div style={{ display: "flex", justifyContent: "space-between", alignItems: "baseline", gap: 12 }}&gt;
        &lt;h1 style={{ fontSize: 34, margin: 0 }}&gt;{study.title}&lt;/h1&gt;
        &lt;Link href={<code class="rounded-sm bg-(--theme-user-msg-text)/10 dark:bg-(--theme-user-msg-text)/15 px-1 py-0.5 text-(--theme-user-msg-text) text-sm">/created/${studyId}</code>} style={{ color: "#444" }}&gt;
          Share link
        &lt;/Link&gt;
      &lt;/div&gt;

      {nextSession &amp;&amp; (
        &lt;div style={{ marginTop: 12, padding: 14, border: "1px solid #ddd", borderRadius: 14 }}&gt;
          &lt;div style={{ fontWeight: 800, marginBottom: 6 }}&gt;Next session&lt;/div&gt;
          &lt;div style={{ color: "#444" }}&gt;{fmt(nextSession.startsAt)}&lt;/div&gt;

          &lt;div style={{ marginTop: 10, display: "flex", gap: 10, flexWrap: "wrap" }}&gt;
            &lt;Link href={<code class="rounded-sm bg-(--theme-user-msg-text)/10 dark:bg-(--theme-user-msg-text)/15 px-1 py-0.5 text-(--theme-user-msg-text) text-sm">/s/${studyId}/session/${nextSession.id}</code>}&gt;
              &lt;Button&gt;Edit session&lt;/Button&gt;
            &lt;/Link&gt;

            &lt;Link href={<code class="rounded-sm bg-(--theme-user-msg-text)/10 dark:bg-(--theme-user-msg-text)/15 px-1 py-0.5 text-(--theme-user-msg-text) text-sm">/s/${studyId}/session/${nextSession.id}/recap</code>}&gt;
              &lt;Button variant="secondary"&gt;Post recap&lt;/Button&gt;
            &lt;/Link&gt;
          &lt;/div&gt;
        &lt;/div&gt;
      )}

      &lt;h2 style={{ marginTop: 22, marginBottom: 10 }}&gt;Sessions&lt;/h2&gt;

      {sessions.length === 0 ? (
        &lt;div style={{ color: "#444" }}&gt;No sessions yet.&lt;/div&gt;
      ) : (
        &lt;div style={{ display: "grid", gap: 10 }}&gt;
          {sessions.map((sess) =&gt; (
            &lt;div key={sess.id} style={{ border: "1px solid #ddd", borderRadius: 14, padding: 14 }}&gt;
              &lt;div style={{ display: "flex", justifyContent: "space-between", gap: 12, alignItems: "baseline" }}&gt;
                &lt;div&gt;
                  &lt;div style={{ fontWeight: 800 }}&gt;
                    {sess.passage?.reference || sess.title || "Session"}
                  &lt;/div&gt;
                  &lt;div style={{ color: "#444", marginTop: 2 }}&gt;{fmt(sess.startsAt)}&lt;/div&gt;
                &lt;/div&gt;

                &lt;div style={{ display: "flex", gap: 10 }}&gt;
                  &lt;Link href={<code class="rounded-sm bg-(--theme-user-msg-text)/10 dark:bg-(--theme-user-msg-text)/15 px-1 py-0.5 text-(--theme-user-msg-text) text-sm">/s/${studyId}/session/${sess.id}</code>}&gt;Edit&lt;/Link&gt;
                  &lt;Link href={<code class="rounded-sm bg-(--theme-user-msg-text)/10 dark:bg-(--theme-user-msg-text)/15 px-1 py-0.5 text-(--theme-user-msg-text) text-sm">/s/${studyId}/session/${sess.id}/recap</code>}&gt;Recap&lt;/Link&gt;
                &lt;/div&gt;
              &lt;/div&gt;

              {sess.recap?.summary ? (
                &lt;div style={{ marginTop: 10, color: "#444" }}&gt;
                  &lt;strong&gt;Recap:&lt;/strong&gt;{" "}
                  {sess.recap.summary.slice(0, 120)}
                  {sess.recap.summary.length &gt; 120 ? "" : ""}
                &lt;/div&gt;
              ) : (
                &lt;div style={{ marginTop: 10, color: "#666" }}&gt;No recap yet.&lt;/div&gt;
              )}
            &lt;/div&gt;
          ))}
        &lt;/div&gt;
      )}

</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">-</span></span><span> Future contributors

---

</span><span><span class="hljs-section"># 1. Product Vision</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-strong">**Make it simple for anyone to start, organize, and lead meaningful Bible study gatherings.**</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">-</span></span><span> Remove friction to starting a study
</span><span><span class="hljs-bullet">-</span></span><span> Support real ministry, not just logistics
